Author: A. P. Gouthey

Quote: Your discipline or lack of discipline will protect you from or expose you to disaster. Practice discipline. Be consistent.

Author: Bobby F. Kimbrough Jr.
Quote: Your situation does not dictate your direction.

Author: Bohdi Sanders
Quote: Focus on making yourself better, not on thinking that you are better.

Author: Book Editor Angelina
Quote: If you are going to write a book, Make sure it is going to be worth reading .

Author: Booker T. Washington
Quote: Few things help an individual more than to place responsibility upon him, and to let him know that you trust him.

Author: Booker T. Washington
Quote: Never let your work drive you. Master it and keep it in complete control.

Author: Booker T. Washington
Quote: Nothing ever comes to one that is worth having except as a result of hard work.

Author: Booker T. Washington
Quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome while trying to succeed.

Author: Booker T. Washington
Quote: You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you had to  overcome to reach your goals.

Author: Brandi L. Bates
Quote: In order to grow, I promise you'll have to let go of some habits. 10 times out of 10, they'll be the habits you're most in love with.

Author: Brandi L. Bates
Quote: No matter what the industry you choose to ultimately invest all your time and energy in, be sure you're the owner, founder, and CEO. Remember, if you don't own it, you can't control it nor can you depend on it.

Author: Brandi L. Bates
Quote: The most empowering thing you can do though is to create innovative ways to bring in livable wages. That begins with a debt free lifestyle.

Author: Brandi L. Bates
Quote: Whatever it is you want in this life, be it material things, a place you want to be, or an experience you want to have, you must first make it real in the realm of your consciousness.

Author: Brandi L. Bates
Quote: You will be perpetually unhappy if you continue to refuse to walk in your calling.

Author: Brandon Sanderson
Quote: Pain loses its power when other things become more important.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: All successful men and women are big dreamers. They imagine what their future could be, ideal in every respect, and then they work every day toward their distant vision, that goal or purpose.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Goals are the fuel in the furnace of achievement.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: If you can dream it, you can do it. Your limits are all within yourself.

Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote: If things start happening, don’t worry, don’t stew, just go right along and you’ll start happening too.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Our mind is the most valuable possession that we have. The quality of your lives is, and will be, a reflection of how well we develop, train, and utilize this precious gift.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Success equals goals... all else is commentary.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Success is predictable.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Successful  people  tend to become more successful  because they are always  thinking about their successes.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others. Unsuccessful people are always asking, 'What's in it for me?'

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Winners make a habit of manufacturing their own positive expectations in advance of the event.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Resolve to be a master of change rather than a victim of change.

Author: Brian Weir
Quote: In order to be walked on, you have to be lying down.

Author: Bridget English
Quote: Everyone has the same amount of hours per day, it's not that you don't have enough time, it's that you don't have a clear focus

Author: Brigham Young
Quote: Education is the power to think clearly, the power to act well in the world's work, and the power to appreciate life.

Author: Brigham Young
Quote: We should never permit ourselves to do anything that we are not willing to see our children do.

Author: Brittany Burgunder
Quote: If only you knew how beautiful you are unconditionally. Don't you know it's enough if all you do is breathe?

Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote: Only you can control your future.

Author: Bruce Jenner
Quote: I learned that the only way you are going to get anywhere in life is to work hard at it. Whether you're a musician, a writer, an athlete or a businessman, there is no getting around it. If you do, you'll win - if you don't you won't.

Author: Bruce Lee
Quote: Defeat is not defeat unless accepted as a reality-in your own mind.

Author: Bruce Lee
Quote: It is not a daily increase, but a daily decrease. Hack away at the inessentials.

Author: Buckminster Fuller
Quote: Our power is in our ability to decide.

Author: Buckminster Fuller
Quote: Real wealth equals ideas plus energy.

Author: Buckminster Fuller
Quote: You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.

Author: Buddha
Quote: A generous heart, kind speech, and a life of service and compassion are the things which renew humanity.

Author: Buddha
Quote: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.

Author: Bunker Hunt
Quote: To be successful, you must decide exactly what you want to accomplish, then resolve to pay the price to get it.

Author: Burton Hills
Quote: Happiness is not a destination. It is a method of life.

Author: Burundi Proverb
Quote: Where there is love there is no darkness.

Author: C. Terry Warner
Quote: Did I love what I was doing, or did I love myself in doing it?

Author: C.K. Webb
Quote: Be thankful for the people who have stood by you and cheered you on, but don't forget to be thankful for the ones that said it could not be done. Writing a book is no small task and even the skeptics can help you get where you want to be!

Author: C.N. Bovee
Quote: Kindness is a language which the dumb can speak, the deaf can understand.

Author: C.S. Lewis
Quote: But one of the worst results of being a slave and being forced to do things is that when there is no one to force you any more you find you have almost lost the power of forcing yourself.

Author: C.S. Lewis
Quote: The more often a man feels without acting, the less he'll be able to act. And in the long run, the less he'll be able to feel.

Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote: If we judge ourselves only by our aspirations and everyone else only their conduct we shall soon reach a very false conclusion.

Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote: Genius will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent. The phrase 'press on' has solved and always will solve the problems of the human race.

Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote: One rule of action more important than all others is consists in never doing anything that someone else can do for you.

Author: Calvin from Calvin and Hobbes
Quote: Know what's weird? Day by day, nothing seems to change, but pretty soon...everything's different.

Author: Camilla Dorand
Quote: If you are looking for answers for your life, know that the answers are within you. When you close your eyes, and focus on your inner God (meditate), you will know what to do. Trust yourself!

Author: Canary Island Proverb
Quote: A gentle breeze blowing in the right direction is better than a pair of strong oars.

Author: Carl Jung
Quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.

Author: Carl Jung
Quote: Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.

Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote: Let a joy keep you. Reach out your hands and take it when it runs by.

Author: Carl Zuckmeyter
Quote: One half of life is luck, the other half is discipline and that's the important half. For without discipline you wouldn't know what to do with luck.

Author: Carlo Brumat
Quote: Only after you challenge your biases and stereotypes-- what Francis Bacon called the 'idols which beset men's minds'--can you help others do the same.

Author: Carlos Wallace
Quote: Don't be managed by the likelihood of mishaps. Be motivated by the promise of favor!

Author: Carol Burnett
Quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.

Author: Casey Stengel
Quote: Most ball games are lost, not won.

Author: Casting Crowns
Quote: It is the spirit of the poets that gives the soldiers strength to fight.

Author: Catherine B. Roy
Quote: If you are in hard times, ask yourself: What would this problem and my life mean to people two hundred years from now?

Author: Cecil B. De Mille
Quote: Make a success of living by seeing the goal and aiming for it unswervingly.

Author: Cecil B. DeMille
Quote: The person who makes a success of living is the one who sees his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly. That is dedication.

Author: Charles Barkley
Quote: The only difference between a good shot and a bad shot is if it goes in or not

Author: Charles Buxton
Quote: You will never find time for anything. You must make it.

Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote: Our minds are as different as our faces: we are all traveling to one destination; --happiness; but few are going by the same road.

Author: Charles Dickens
Quote: You touch some of the reasons for my going, not for my staying away.

Author: Charles Duhigg
Quote: When we start a new task, or confront an unpleasant chore, we should take a moment to ask ourselves "why.

Author: Charles F. Kettering
Quote: It's amazing what ordinary people can do if they set out without preconceived notions.

Author: Charles Givens
Quote: Success requires first expending ten units of effort to produce one unit of results. Your momentum will then produce ten units of results with each unit of effort.

Author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon
Quote: If we do not touch the heart, we will soon weary the ear.

Author: Charles Kendall Adams
Quote: No one ever attains very eminent success by simply doing what is required of him; it is the amount and excellence of what is over and above the required that determines the greatness of ultimate distinction.

Author: Charles Lindbergh
Quote: Success is not measured by what a man accomplishes, but by the opposition he has encountered and the courage with which he has maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.

Author: Charles M. Shultz
Quote: Sometimes I lie awake at night and ask, ï¿½Where have I gone wrong?ï¿½ Then a voice says to me, ï¿½This is going to take more than one night.ï¿½

Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote: The past is over …. Forget it. The future holds hope …. Reach for it.

Author: Charles Reade
Quote: Sow a thought, and you reap an act; Sow an act, and you reap a habit; Sow a habit, and you reap a character; Sow a character, and you reap a destiny.

Author: Charles Schwab
Quote: A man can succeed at almost anything for which he has unlimited enthusiasm.

Author: Charles, Count Talleyrand
Quote: Such a good friend that she will throw all her acquaintances into the water for the pleasure of fishing them out again.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: A man's true character comes out when he's drunk.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: A tramp, a gentleman, a poet, a dreamer, a lonely fellow, always hopeful of romance and adventure.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Actors search for rejection. If they don’t get it they reject themselves.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: All I need to make a comedy is a park, a policeman and a pretty girl.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: All my pictures are built around the idea of getting the trouble and so giving me the chance to be desperately serious in my attempt to appear as a normal little gentleman.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Despair is a narcotic. It lulls the mind into indifference.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Dictators free themselves, but they enslave the people.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: I always like walking in the rain, so no one can see me crying.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: I am at peace with God. My conflict is with man.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: I am for people. I can't help it.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: I believe in the power of laughter and tears as an antidote to hatred and terror.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: I do not need drugs to be genius, do not take a genius to be human, but I need your smile to be happy.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: I don’t believe that the public knows what it wants; this is the conclusion that I have drawn from my career.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: I remain just one thing, and one thing only -- and that is a clown. It places me on a far higher plane than any politician.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: I suppose that’s one of the ironies of life doing the wrong thing at the right moment.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: I went into the business for the money, and the art grew out of it. If people are disillusioned by that remark, I can't help it. It's the truth.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: I’d sooner be called a successful crook than a destitute monarch.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Imagination means nothing without doing.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: In the end, everything is a gag.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: In the light of our egos, we are all dethroned monarchs.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Life can be wonderful if you're not afraid of it. All it takes is courage, imagination …. And a little dough.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Life is a play that does not allow testing. So, sing, cry, dance, laugh and live intensely, before the curtain closes and the piece ends with no applause.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Life would be wonderful if people would leave you alone.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Man as an individual is a genius. But men in the mass form the headless monster, a great, brutish idiot that goes where prodded.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Movies are a fad. Audiences really want to see live actors on a stage.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: My pain may be the reason for somebody’s laugh. But my laugh must never be the reason for somebody’s pain.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Nothing is permanent in this wicked world - not even our troubles.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Only the unloved hate; the unloved and the unnatural.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Patriotism is too deep a feeling to depict in the posing for a photograph.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Perfect love is the most beautiful of all frustrations because it is more than one can express.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Remember, you can always stoop and pick up nothing.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: That’s the trouble with the world. We all despise ourselves.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: The mirror is my best friend because when i cry it never laughs.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: The saddest thing I can imagine is to get used to luxury.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: There are more valid facts and details in works of art than there are in history books.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Think about yourself at least once in your life otherwise you may miss the best comedy in this world.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: This is a ruthless world and one must be rughless to cope with it.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: To help a friend in need is easy, but to give him your time is not always opportune.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: To truly laugh, you must be able to take your pain, and play with it.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: We all want to help one another. Human beings are like that. We want to live by each other’s happiness, not by each other’s misery.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: We think too much and feel too little.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: What do you want a meaning for? Life is a desire, not a meaning.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Why should poetry have to make sense?

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Words are cheap. The biggest thing you can say is ‘elephant’.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: You need Power, only when you want to do something harmful otherwise Love is enough to get everything done.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: You’ll find that life is still worthwhile, if you just smile.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: You’ll never find a rainbow if you’re looking down.

Author: Charlotte Eriksson
Quote: Do what ought to be done, here and now, to get you somewhere anywhere.

Author: Charlotte Eriksson
Quote: Do you wait for things to happen, or do you make them happen yourself? I believe in writing your own story.

Author: Charlotte Eriksson
Quote: I just want to be someone, to mean something to anyone.

Author: Charlotte Eriksson
Quote: I'm not everything I want to be, but I'm more than I was, and I'm still learning.

Author: Charlotte Eriksson
Quote: The final magnificent spark of a firework is only the last seconds of the fall. Though it's invisible to most, it's the way up that creates all the impact.

Author: Cheryl L. Ilov
Quote: When you know what you're doing, you can do what you want.

Author: Chidiebere Prosper Agbugba
Quote: Everyday I'm inspired to inspire others.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: It is better to light one candle than to curse the darkness.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: Patience and the mulberry leaf becomes a silk gown.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: The man who moved a mountain was the one who began carrying away small stones.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: Wealth is but dung, useful only when spread about.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: You can never be happy at the expense of the happiness of others.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: A wise man adapts himself to circumstances as water shapes itself to the vessel that contains it.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: A wise man makes his own decisions; an ignorant man follows the public opinion.

Author: Chinese proverb
Quote: An army of a thousand is easy to find, but, ah, how difficult to find a general.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: Better to light one small candle than to curse the darkness.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: If a man does only what is required of him, he is a slave. If a man does more than is required of him, he is a free man.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: One joy scatters a hundred griefs.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: One man tells a lie, dozens repeat it as the truth.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: Only when all contribute their firewood can they build up a strong fire.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: Procrastination is the thief of time.

Author: Chinese Proverb
Quote: To understand your parents' love you must raise children yourself.

Author: Chinonye J. Chidolue
Quote: Don't complain about difficult situations. They contain in them the motivation to succeed.

Author: Chinonye J. Chidolue
Quote: Every human life bears a significant importance to the existence of humanity

Author: Chinonye J. Chidolue
Quote: Others can't always define your true identity. They see what they 'want' to see but beyond your mess, God sees the beauty He created and still thinks it's good!

Author: Chinonye J. Chidolue
Quote: Pat yourself on the back when you win. And when you don't, just keep moving! So long as you don't stop moving, Soon you may realize just how close you are to winning!

Author: Chinonye J. Chidolue
Quote: We avoid risks in life only to die, and end up facing the greatest risk which is having lived life risking nothing at all.

Author: Chinonye J. Chidolue
Quote: Your future, hopes and dreams should never be tied down to anybody! The strength lies inside of you to decide at any moment your direction.

Author: Chris Burkmenn
Quote: Be so focused on believing that you can that it doesn't matter if anyone says you can't.

Author: Chris Matakas
Quote: Habits are infinitely more beneficial to the aspiring student than motivation. Motivation may get you started, but habits keep you going.

Author: Chris Matakas
Quote: Just know that the achievement of anything grand takes consistent effort year after year. Motivation can uphold you intermittently, but it has too few calories to sustain a life.

Author: Chris Matakas
Quote: Systems and processes will always surpass motivation.

Author: Chris Matthews
Quote: The author deduces the best way James Baker serve Reagan as Chief of Staff was to continually remind him why he wanted to be president.

Author: Christabel Pankhurst
Quote: Ability is sexless.

Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote: Difficulties, by bracing the mind to overcome them, assist cheerfulness, as exercise assists digestion.

Author: Christopher Babson
Quote: There is no failure, unless we fail to begin or we fail to continue.

Author: Martin Luther King JR.
Quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don’t see the whole staircase.

Author: Christy Borgeld
Quote: The foundation my parents laid down with our faith continues to be my core.

Author: Christy Borgeld
Quote: To succeed, you need to take that gut feeling in what you believe and act on it with all of your heart.

Author: Christy Borgeld
Quote: Instill great values in your children today and your grandchildren will prosper tomorrow.

Author: Christy Borgeld
Quote: As a mother of teenagers, do you know how many times I picked up the phone to apologize to my own mother?

Author: Christy Borgeld
Quote: Fathers are like a lighthouseï¿½ when there is fog his children can always depend on seeing the light.

Author: Christy Borgeld
Quote: Motherhood qualified me to let the child within come out and play.

Author: Christy Borgeld
Quote: Never giving up and pushing forward will unlock all the potential we are capable of.

Author: Chuck Lindbergh
Quote: Life without risk is not worth living.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote: The voice says, maybe you don't go to hell for the things you do. Maybe you go to hell for the things you don't do. The things you don't finish.

Author: Chuck Sigars
Quote: This is the best kind of voyeurism, hearing joy from your neighbors.

Author: Cicero
Quote: The function of wisdom is to discriminate between good and evil.

Author: Cicero
Quote: Where is there dignity unless there is honesty?

Author: Cicero
Quote: We must not say every mistake is a foolish one.

Author: Cier Galla
Quote: God is an author, and we are His best story.

Author: Cindi Altman
Quote: Look on the brighter side of life, for there is sunshine beyond the clouds.

Author: Clair Oliver
Quote: Society may predict, but only I can determine my destiny.

Author: Claude Bernard
Quote: Art is I; Science is We.

Author: Claude M. Bristol
Quote: It's the repetition of affirmations that leads to belief. And once that belief becomes a deep conviction, things begin to happen.

Author: Claudia Black
Quote: Trust in yourself. Your perceptions are often far more accurate than you are willing to believe.

Author: Clement Stone
Quote: For every disadvantage there is a corresponding advantage.

Author: Clifford Cohen
Quote: If you're gonna go broke, go for broke.

Author: Clifford Cohen
Quote: You can do anything but before you can do anything, you have to do something.

Author: Coco Chanel
Quote: The best things in life are free.

Author: Colin Powell
Quote: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.

Author: Colin Powell
Quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

Author: Colin Powell
Quote: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.

Author: Colossians 3:15
Quote: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be yet thankful.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: And how dies the wise man? As the fool. Therefore I hated life; because the work that is wrought under the sun is grievous unto me: for all is vanity and vexation of spirit.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: And this have I found, that man was made upright; but they have sought out many inventions.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: Behold, this have I found also, counting one by one, to find out the account: Which yet my soul seek, but I find not: one man among a thousand have I found; but a woman among all those have I not found.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: For there is no remembrance of the wise more than of the fool for ever; seeing that which now is in the days to come shall all be forgotten in the heart of the sons of men.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: For what had man of all his labor, and of the vexation of his heart, wherein he had labored under the sun? For all his days are sorrows, and his travail grief; yea, his heart takes not rest in the night.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: He that observes the wind shall not sow; and he that regards the clouds shall not reap.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: I cast thy bread upon the waters: for thou shall find it after many days. And gives a portion to seven, and also to eight; for thou know not what evil shall be upon the earth.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: I gathered for myself also silver and gold, and the peculiar treasure of kings and of the provinces:

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: I got myself servants and maidens, and had servants born in my house; also I had great possessions of great and small cattle above all that were in my town before me:

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: I had men singers and women singers, and the delights of the sons of men, as musical instruments, and that of all sorts.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: I looked on all the works that my hands had wrought, and on the labor that I had labored to do: and, behold, all was vanity and vexation of spirit, and there was no profit under the sun.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: I made myself great works; I build houses for myself; I planted vineyards: I made myself gardens and orchards, and I planted trees in them of all kind of fruits: I made pools of water, to water therewith the wood that brings forth trees:

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: I said in my heart, As it happens to the fool, so it happens even to the wise; and why was I then more wise?

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: I saw that wisdom excel folly, as far as light excel darkness: and I myself perceived also that one event happens to them all.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: I sought in mine heart to give myself unto wine, yet acquainting mine heart with wisdom; and to lay hold on folly, till I might see what was that good for the sons of men, which they should do under the sun all the days of their lives.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: I turned myself to behold wisdom, for what can the man do that cometh after the king? Even that which had been already done.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: I was great, and increased more than all that were before me in my town: also my wisdom remained with me.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: If the clouds be full of rain, they empty themselves upon the earth: and if the tree falls toward the south, or toward the north, in the place where the tree falls, there it shall be.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: The wise man's eyes are in his head; but the fool walks in darkness: and I myself perceived also that one event happens to them all.

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: Whatsoever mine eyes desired I kept not from them, I withheld not my heart from any joy; for my heart rejoiced in all my labor: and this was my portion of all my labor; Death!

Author: Compton Gage
Quote: Wherefore I praised the dead which are already dead more than the living which are still alive. Better is he than both they, which had not yet been, who had not seen the evil work that is done under the sun.

Author: Confucius
Quote: A gentleman can withstand hardships; it is only the small man who, when submitted to them, is swept off his feet.

Author: Confucius
Quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling but in rising every time we fall.

Author: Confucius
Quote: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.

Author: Confucius
Quote: Wheresoever you go, go with all your heart.

Author: Confucius
Quote: A man who has committed a mistake and doesn't correct it is committing another mistake.

Author: Confucius
Quote: Be not ashamed of mistakes and thus make them crimes.

Author: Confucius
Quote: Go before the people with your example, and be laborious in their affairs.

Author: Confucius
Quote: Only those who are absolutely their true selves in this world can have pervading influence.

Author: Confucius
Quote: The man of virtue makes the difficulty to be overcome his first business, and success only a subsequent consideration.

Author: Congolese Proverb
Quote: Children are the reward of life.

Author: Connor Franta
Quote: Add your splash of color to the world.

Author: Connor George Serbin
Quote: Just be happy that it is what it is and not what it could be because after all, it could always be worse

Author: Constance Chuks Friday
Quote: The full length of a frog doesn't have to be seen when it's dead. It has to be seen when it jumps. Aim for greater heights always.

Author: Constance Friday
Quote: Do not be afraid of that which should be afraid of you

Author: Constance Friday
Quote: Do not be afraid of what should be afraid of you

Author: Corneille
Quote: To win without risk is to triumph without glory.

Author: Cornelius Nepos
Quote: The power is detested, and miserable the life, of him who wishes to be feared rather than to be loved.

Author: Cowper
Quote: Knowledge is proud that she knows so much; wisdom is humble that she knows no more.

Author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
Quote: An idea without sacrifice, regardless of grand it might be, will never be anything more than an idea.

Author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
Quote: To seek the praise of men as our motivation is to abandon truly great things, for more often than not truly great things elicit the ire of men far more than they garner their praises.

Author: Criss Jami
Quote: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.

Author: Criss Jami
Quote: We must not allow our pride to be the motivation behind our apologetics; rather, philoverity, the love of truth must be the full and complete motivation. For pride corrupts truth.

Author: Cullen Hightower
Quote: Laughing at our mistakes can lengthen our own life. Laughing at someone else's can shorten it.

Author: Czech Proverb
Quote: Do not protect yourself by a fence, but rather by your friends.

Author: D. Antoinette Foy
Quote: Don't be afraid to be afraid. Have fear, and then conquer the shit out of it.

Author: D. Elder
Quote: Dreamers look into the future and see promise. Those who don’t dream only see the future.

Quote: People of mediocre ability sometimes achieve outstanding success because they don't know when to quit. Most men succeed because they are determined to.

Author: Henry Ford
Quote: You can't build a reputation on what you're going to do.

Quote: Capture my heart and my mind. Become my ultimate challenge, greatest vexation, strongest desire, and most precious blessing.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Dare to be more than ordinary... Dare to be extraordinary.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Death, like so much in life, is a lesson, which must be understood and cherished, not feared; it is a rite of passage we all must encounter at one time or another; it helps build our character and makes us stronger if we can endure its painful aftermath.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Do not strive to be perfect. Strive to be perfectly imperfect.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Don't try to reach perfection. Just try to reach an inner and outer realization of self.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Don't try to worry about the things that could've happen. Just wonder about the things that can still happen and fight for them. Because anything worth fighting for will happen in time.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Dreams are like puzzles. When all the pieces are missing, it is up to us to find them and decide where and how they fit in.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Even if I don't have wings to fly, I'll close my eyes and open my heart; then I'll make love my wings and hope the winds that give me flight.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Hope may seem frail. But in the face of adversity, hope can be our strongest ally.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: I always look towards the light of my desires, so I never forget where I'm going.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: I love being high. High on Life, High on Love, High on Hope, and High on Faith.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: In times of division and strife, build bridges to the hearts of those clouded by anger, hurt, hatred, and ignorance, so you can help open and understand their minds and hearts, and they can understand yours.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: It has been passed down in many texts of old and by the word of mouth; that no matter the strength of the weapons of man, there is only one thing powerful enough to defeat them all... The power of love.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Kiss away the past as you head towards the future.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Let the beauty radiate from inside your heart to the outside world.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Let your innocence show as brilliant as your dreams because only then can you discover the true beauty of love.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Living on Faith. Striving on Desire. Flying on Hope.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Love, it is timeless. It can transcend the very limits of time and space, as long as it stays forever true in our hearts.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Moving is not about forgetting. It's about moving forward and never looking back.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Moving on is not about forgetting. It's about moving forward and never looking back.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: My heart is on the brink of a world so foreign that it feels like a fantasy. Blessed do I feel when I think of your heart which is so warm that it melts the frozen world we live in. Blessed I am with all of you that I hold near and dear to my heart.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: My strength is my pride. My pride is my heart. And my heart will always be mine and mine alone.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Mystery is what makes women, woman. A woman without mystery is no woman. She is a girl who has yet discovered the depths of her heart.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: No matter what happens in your life, keep an open heart and mind with a gentle smile. It's the true beauty of the heart.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: No matter where we come from, there is one language we can all speak and understand from birth, the language of the heart, love.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Our hearts may be strong and resilient against the trials of life, but they become weak and fragile against the trials of love.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Our past is what molds us into the person we are today. It does not define us.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Reflect onto the world what you want them to see. Let your heart help them figure out the rest of who you truly are.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Secrets are a part of life. Their mysteries make our world beautiful. Their depths inspire our hearts, intrigue our minds, and embrace our very souls.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Some people need a super hero to save them, but I am my own super hero. All I need is myself, my strengths and the fiery passions in my heart to overcome the obstacles in my life.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Sometimes we need to just brush away our pride, break down the walls around our hearts, and open up to those we truly care for.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Sometimes you just have to find something to keep your body grounded, your mind flexible, and your heart open.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: Sometimes you just have to find the majesty in yourself and other things to truly appreciate life.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: The heart is a rare, unique treasure because it is strong and vulnerable at the same time. It is strong in its persistence to sustain life, yet it is vulnerable to both emotional and physical wounds.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: The things I do are known to the world, but why I do them is my secret alone.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: There are so many things that we learn in our lives most of which we can't learn without seeing the hearts of others.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: To dream is to desire, to desire is to long for, to long for is to want, and to want you must work to attain all you dream of, desire, long for and want.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: To overcome the sadness of our hearts, we must remember the joys of our lives.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: True beauty happens when two worlds collide and become one.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: We always want to hold on tight to those we love; but if we intend to keep those we love, we must let go every once in awhile.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: We need to find the light within ourselves, so we can see our true worth.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: We shouldn't live in a world where we live in constant terror. We need less dying and more living. We need less destroying and more building. We need less hate and more love.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: What you do is your choice. You can make good or bad choices, but there will never be any right or wrong to who you are.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: When people tell you that you aren't something or you can't accomplish your dreams, you can either cry about it or prove them wrong.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: When regret and shame fades away, beauty will be in your heart to forever stay.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: When we can see the star of desire in our sky, we can use our wings of hope and our air of love to reach it.

Author: Imania Margria
Quote: When we release all the negativity in our lives and notice the beauty all around us, we'll see what truly matters in life.

Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote: Silence is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.

Author: Indeewara Jayawardane
Quote: You can be clumsy yet clever. You can be classy yet poor. It's not tearing a leaf off a calendar which will make you a better or a worse man but the attitude that you have from dusk till dawn every day.

Author: Indian Proverb
Quote: In love beggar and king are equal.

Author: Indian Proverb
Quote: It is love that makes the impossible possible.

Author: Indian Proverb
Quote: Learning acquired in youth is an inscription on stone.

Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote: Happiness consists of a solid faith, good health, and a bad memory.

Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe
Quote: If all work and no play makes you dull, Then you're on the wrong job.

Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe
Quote: It is when life pushes you down that you learn to get up and go higher.

Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe
Quote: Moving islands in the ocean of sky. Beautiful white curtains in the sky, Veiling and unveiling portions, as time passes by. I watch clouds, when my mind feels clouded.

Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe
Quote: The future starts within a second from now. The past was, within a second ago.

Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe
Quote: The road does seem long before you embark on the journey, That's why I think the most difficult part is to start. But when you are in motion, and steps taken become many, Nothing can stop you; that's only if you guard your heart.

Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe
Quote: The struggle hurts now but will be sweet in times of retrospect.

Author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe
Quote: When you know your role in life, living makes sense because of clarity, and the loads become enjoyable to carry.

Author: INTERNET
Quote: Life Begins at the end of your comfort zone.

Author: Iranian Proverb
Quote: A gentle hand may lead even an elephant by a single hair.

Author: Irish Proverb
Quote: There is no luck except where there is discipline.

Author: Irish Proverb
Quote: You'll never plow a field by turning it over in your mind.

Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote: It has been my philosophy of life that difficulties vanish when faced boldly.

Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote: It has been my philosophy of life that difficulties vanish when faced boldly.

Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote: No sensible decision can be made any longer without taking into account not only the world as it is, but the world as it will be.

Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote: What nature delivers to us is never stale. Because what nature creates has eternity in it.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: A man may imagine things that are false, but he can only understand things that are true, for if the things be false, the apprehension of them is not understanding.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: Atheism is so senseless & odious to mankind that it never had many professors.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: Atheism is so senseless. When I look at the solar system, I see the earth at the right distance from the sun to receive the proper amounts of heat and light. This did not happen by chance.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: Errors are not in the art but in the artificers.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: God created everything by number, weight and measure.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: I can calculate the motion of heavenly bodies, but not the madness of people.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: If I am anything, which I highly doubt, I have made myself so by hard work.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: If I had stayed for other people to make my tools and things for me, I had never made anything

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: If I have ever made any valuable discoveries, it has been due more to patient attention, than to any other talent

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: Live your life as an Exclamation rather than an Explanation

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: My powers are ordinary. Only my application brings me success.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: Nature is pleased with simplicity. And nature is no dummy

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: No great discovery was ever made without a bold guess.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: Plato is my friend, Aristotle is my friend, but my greatest friend is truth.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: Tact is the art of making a point without making an enemy.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: To arrive at the simplest truth requires years of contemplation.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: To myself I am only a child playing on the beach, while vast oceans of truth lie undiscovered before me

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: Truth is ever to be found in the simplicity, and not in the multiplicity and confusion of things.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: Truth is the offspring of silence and meditation.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: We build too many walls and not enough bridges.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: What goes up must come down.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: What we know is a drop, what we don't know is an ocean.

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: Whence arises all that order and beauty we see in the world?

Author: Isaac Newton
Quote: You have to make the rules, not follow them

Author: Islamic Proverb
Quote: A kind speech and forgiveness is better than alms followed by injury.

Author: Israel Zangwill
Quote: The Jews are a frightened people. Nineteen centuries of Christian love have broken their nerves.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: Leaders create awareness in their followers about the great potentials they carry and how to release them for the benefit of all. Leaders are motivators,

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: Leaders don't step on toes of dwarfs. They mount shoulders of giants.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: Leaders motivate people to understand that they can do better than they've already done and go farther than they've reached.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: Leadership is built on inspirations. Inspiration does both the theoretical and the practical job. By inspiration, people are not only informed to know what is right. But they are also convinced to always do what's right.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: People can destroy people; People can also decorate. The former are misleaders; the latter are leaders.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: The common goal of leaders is to increase the value and productivity of people. Leaders inspire others to do better than they would have done when not inspired.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: When motivation flows, people see work as interesting as music. They enjoy it till they do more than they could have done. Leaders motivate people to do greater things.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: Words do less than 10 things, but actions do more than 10 thousand things. Leaders don't talk in vain; they follow with actions.

Author: Itzik Amiel
Quote: Do what most people Won't, so you can have what most people Don't.

Author: Ivan Scheier
Quote: The broadest, and maybe the most meaningful definition of volunteering: Doing more than you have to because you want to, in a cause you consider good.

Author: Izey Victoria Odiase
Quote: A Rival Can Become an Important Ally If WE Find A Common Ground

Author: Izey Victoria Odiase
Quote: Celebrate Yourself. You are Unique!

Author: Izey Victoria Odiase
Quote: Chase Dreams, Not People. The right people will be drawn to you.

Author: Izey Victoria Odiase
Quote: Failure is not an option. Keep going!

Author: Izey Victoria Odiase
Quote: God is my happy place

Author: Izey Victoria Odiase
Quote: Hard work is vital to success. As long as it's in the right direction!

Author: Izey Victoria Odiase
Quote: Knowledge is NOT power. The correct application of knowledge is power.

Author: Izey Victoria Odiase
Quote: There's usually more than one way to complete a task. I will not stay stuck in my ways. I will remain motivated and open-minded.

Author: Izey Victoria Odiase
Quote: You're perfect! You have everything you need to fulfill your purpose.

Author: J. Cole
Quote: Happiness is the highest level of success.

Author: J. Petit Senn
Quote: Happiness is where we find it, but rarely where we seek it.

Author: J. Richard Clarke
Quote: The best leader brings out the best in those he has stewardship over.

Author: J.A. Froude
Quote: Fear is the parent of cruelty.

Author: J.C. Penney
Quote: Give me a stock clerk with a goal and I'll give you a man who will make history. Give me a man with no goals and I'll give you a stock clerk.

Author: J.C. Penny
Quote: Unless you are willing to drench yourself in your work beyond the capacity of the average man, you are just not cut out for positions at the top.

Author: J.D.  Crighton
Quote: Enthusiasm is highly contagious, so what are you waiting for? Contaminate your students

Author: J.D.  Crighton
Quote: If you find yourself wondering if you can go on, remember how much you've accomplished. Then raise your head high and be proud. YOU GOT THIS!

Author: J.D.  Crighton
Quote: You have the power to motivate and inspire. Let your enthusiasm shine through

Author: J.F.T. Bugental
Quote: Devotion is a choice to focus one's being in a certain way, to bring one's faith, commitment, creativity, and love into coordination with a particular value and purpose.

Author: J.G. Holland
Quote: The heart is wiser than the intellect.

Author: J.P. Morgan
Quote: Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you'll be able to see farther.

Author: J.R. Ridinger
Quote: The only difference between a success and a failure is that the successful person is willing to do what the failure is not willing to do.

Author: J.R. Rim
Quote: Discipline is for professionals. Motivation is for amateurs.

Author: J.S. Knox
Quote: You cannot antagonize and influence at the same time.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu
Quote: I am not afraid of tomorrow for I have seen yesterday, I have today and I know Him who holds tomorrow so I know tomorrow will be beautiful for me.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu
Quote: What have you gained since you haven't prayed? What will you lose if you pray?

Author: Jack Campbell
Quote: I need to stop getting into situations where all my options are potentially bad.

Author: Jack Canfield
Quote: Everything you want is on the other side of fear.

Author: Jack Canfield
Quote: If you are not moving closer to what you want in life, you probably aren't doing enough asking.

Author: Jack Canfield
Quote: Success isn't magic or hocus-pocus -- its simply learning how to focus.

Author: Jack Canfield
Quote: To change bad habits, we must study the habits of successful role models.

Author: Jack Canfield
Quote: When you think you can't...revisit  a previous triumph.

Author: Jack Welch
Quote: Control Your Own Destiny or Someone Else Will

Author: Jack Welch
Quote: Face reality as it is, not as it was or as you wish it to be.

Author: Jacquelinemae A. Rudd
Quote: Teamwork is the long word for success.

Author: Jag Randhawa
Quote: Success is the result of actions. Stop wishing and start doing.

Author: Jaiendra Puri
Quote: More you are afraid, the more you sleep. Wake up & don't be afraid Keep your head up & kill your nightmare.

Author: Jakob Dylan
Quote: Tolerance can lead to learning something.

Author: James Allen
Quote: Having conceived of his purpose, a man should mentally mark out a straight pathway to its achievement, looking, neither to the right nor to the left, but straight.

Author: James Allen
Quote: The key to happiness is having dreams; the key to success is making them come true.

Author: James Allen
Quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good. Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom.

Author: James Allen
Quote: The will to do springs from the knowledge that we can do.

Author: James Anthony Froude
Quote: Instruction does not prevent wasted time or mistakes; and mistakes themselves are often the best teachers of all.

Author: James Champy
Quote: Without ambition no conquests are made, and no business created. Ambition is the root of all achievement.

Author: James F. Bell
Quote: Fear is met and destroyed with courage. Again and again when the struggle seems hopeless and all opportunity lost, the one wit a little more courage, and a little more effort will have victory.

Author: James Gordon
Quote: It's not that some people have willpower and some don't... It's that some people are ready to change and others are not.

Author: James Oppenheim
Quote: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance, the wise grows it under his feet.

Author: James Oppenheim
Quote: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance. The wise grows it under his feet.

Author: James P. Krehbiel
Quote: Inevitably, if we are to grow and change as adults, we must gradually learn to confront the challenges, paradoxes, problems and painful reality of an insecure world.

Author: James Thomas
Quote: To be a great leader and so always master of the situation, one must of necessity have been a great thinker in action. An eagle was never yet hatched from a goose's egg.

Author: Jane Addams
Quote: Nothing could be worse than the fear that one had given up too soon, and left one unexpended effort that might have saved the world.

Author: Jane Nelsen
Quote: Where did we ever get the crazy idea that in order to make children do better, first we have to make them feel worse? Think of the last time you felt humiliated or treated unfairly. Did you feel like cooperating or doing better?

Author: Janet Erskine Stuart
Quote: Do not wait for ideal circumstances; they will never come; nor for the best opportunities.

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: Do not be obsessed with expensive things. Instead, be obsessed with excellence. Things don't make you excellent. However, excellence will make you expensive.

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: Don't let people intimidate you into downgrading your goals. They intimidate only because they are intimidated by your goals.

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: Epic fails are just dramatic pauses to build up intensity of epic awesomeness emerging.

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: Eyes are the windows to the soul. A smile is the mirror of the heart

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: I'd rather be the jester who adds value to those around me than a King with no vision or intention of making a difference.

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: If people aren't on board with your dreams, there is still that one man canoe. Sail on and slay on with it.

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: On doors of opportunity, if that door doesn't open, Don't worry. It was probably best you got locked out than be locked in. Move on to the next door.

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: Passion is the fuel for excellence. Rest, vacation or a pay rise can't make you create excellence in your work. Find what makes you passionate about what you do

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: People don't need to know how good you are. Just smile, just slay and just show.

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: Players focus on the wins and the loses. Builders focus on the team and future of the vision. Let's move our members from team player to team builder.

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: Smile and Slay. You have to slay it in life or life will slay you.

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: We weren't born to create excuses, we were born to create excellence.

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: Yesterday was just the tip of the iceberg of awesomeness. Things will get better. Keep smiling, don't give up just yet. Perseverance has an amazing gift for you, just wait you see.

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: You are way awesome than you think you are. Don't forget about your awesomeness today

Author: Janna Cachola
Quote: You have a right to be you. It is a privilege for others to be around you.

Author: Japanese Proverb
Quote: Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare.

Author: Japanese Proverb
Quote: He who treads the path of love walks a thousand meters as if it were only one.

Author: Japanese Proverb
Quote: Into the house where joy lives, happiness will gladly come.

Author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber
Quote: Dear 2016, If I has any defeats in your term, I am glad they were on my terms! Best, The Defeated Winner

Author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber
Quote: In a corner you condense yourself and cry- in the same corner you caress and kiss. Life is this, something different each time.

Author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber
Quote: In the world we live, we don't create or destroy- we just convert entities from one form to another. Loss and Sorrow too. If these are growing in your life- remember you are feeding them.

Author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber
Quote: One day, all your worries will set like the sun does and deserved happiness will come gushing like waves at the beach do. All you need to make sure id that your trips to beach never end.

Author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber
Quote: One day, all your worries will set like the sun does and deserved happiness will come gushing like waves at the beach do. All you need to make sure is that your trips to beach never end.

Author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber
Quote: She is that maze, the one you would love to chase. She is the faith, quite missing nowadays. And her heart is a rave, with hopeless barricades. She is the one, whose tears flow, just as lavishly, as her laughter roars!

Author: Jawaharlal Nehru
Quote: Success often comes to those who dare to act. It seldom goes to the timid who are ever afraid of the consequences.

Author: Jay Watkins
Quote: My dreams are a little too big for me now, but I'll grow into them.

Author: Jaymin Shah
Quote: All the so-called "secrets of success" will not work unless you do.

Author: Jaymin Shah
Quote: Each day wake up and ask yourself what will make you feel most alive that day.

Author: Jayson Engay
Quote: We always need a motivation, in order for us to meet our full potential at work.

Author: Jean Jacques Rousseau
Quote: What wisdom can you find that is greater than kindness?

Author: Jean Jacques Rousseau
Quote: Man is born free, and everywhere he is in chains.

Author: Jean Piaget
Quote: The principal goal of education is to create men who are capable of doing new things, not simply of repeating what other generations have done.

Author: Jean Renoir
Quote: The truly terrible thing is that everybody has their reasons.

Author: Jean Sibelius
Quote: Pay no attention to what the critics say; no statue has ever been erected to a critic.

Author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Quote: Nature never deceives us; it is we who deceive ourselves.

Author: Jeannie Powell
Quote: Excerpts from Life, Simplified can be found on my website.

Author: Jefferson Smith
Quote: Trust not in Sprites nor the motivations of a Gnome.

Author: Jenna Mullins
Quote: People will let you down in this business every single day. I think you'll be let down and disappointed more than you'll be accepted and excited. But you need to find ways to keep yourself inspired. This is mine. What's yours?

Author: Jennifer Ho-Dougatz
Quote: Do you really need permission? Still waiting for that invitation to your life? No one is going to give it to you...only you can do that.

Author: Jennifer James
Quote: Success is every minute you live. It's the process of living. It's stopping for the moments of beauty, of pleasure; the moments of peace. Success is not a destination that you ever reach. Success is the quality of the journey.

Author: Jerry Dunn
Quote: Don't limit your challenges; challenge  your limits.

Author: Jerry Greenfield
Quote: It's to be expected that you make mistakes when you're breaking new ground.

Author: Jerry L. Lewis
Quote: Faithfulness in small things leads to faithfulness in great things, and never the other way around.

Author: Jerry Van Amerongen
Quote: I feel like a tiny bird with a big song!

Author: Jessica Shirvington
Quote: If I didn't have Lincoln's butt to stare at the whole time, motivation would be a lot harder to come by.

Author: Jill Badonsky
Quote: Take the next little step-the smaller you make it, the more likely you'll take it..

Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote: It's not about perfect. It's about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that's where transformation happens. That's how change occurs.

Author: Jim Bouchard
Quote: Perfection is not a destination; it's a never-ending process...Enjoy!

Author: Jim Butcher
Quote: I put on the boots and kicked some monster ass.

Author: Jim Butcher
Quote: In the name of the Pizza Lord. Charge!

Author: Jim Butcher
Quote: You don't go walking into the proverbial lion's den lightly. You start with a good breakfast.

Author: Jim Fargiano
Quote: When you feel down and out you must reach up and out--to Spirit! Our strength will only resonate deep within your souls if you open your heart and minds with us.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: Failure is not a single, cataclysmic event. You don't fail overnight. Instead, failure is a few errors in judgment, repeated every day.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: If you go to work on your goals, your goals will go to work on you. If you go to work on your plan, your plan will go to work on you. Whatever good things we build end up building us.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: If you really want to do something, you’ll find a way. If you don’t, you’ll find an excuse.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: Learn to work harder on yourself than you do on your job. If you work hard on your job you can make a living, but if you work hard on yourself you'll make a fortune.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: Success is 20% skills and 80% strategy. You might know how to read, but more importantly, what's your plan to read?

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: Success is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: Success is not so much what we have, as it is what we are.

Author: Jim Ryun
Quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going!

Author: Jimmy Dean
Quote: For true success ask yourself these four questions: Why? Why not? Why not me? Why not now?

Author: JKJaiswal
Quote: Our food is transformed from the moment when its sowed, cultured, grown, until its ready to serve. Our desires are likewise.

Author: Joan Baez
Quote: Action is the antidote to despair.

Author: Joan Lunden
Quote: Remove failure as an option.

Author: Joan Rivers
Quote: Listen. I wish I could tell you it gets better. But, it doesn't get better. You get better.

Author: Joann Thomas
Quote: Sometimes the best helping hand you can get is a good, firm push.

Author: Job 32:9
Quote: Great men are not always wise.

Author: Joe Klock
Quote: It is the very essence of good leadership to give away all credit for positive achievement, to identify only team goals and always to refer to them as such.

Author: Joe Knapp
Quote: Success is living up to your potential. That's all. Wake up with a smile and go after life ... live it, enjoy it, taste it, smell it, feel it.

Author: Joe Lewis
Quote: He who fails to prepare, prepares to fail.

Author: Joe Namath
Quote: If you aren't going all the way, why go at all?

Author: Johann Gottfried Von Herder
Quote: Without inspiration the best powers of the mind remain dormant, they is a fuel in us which needs to be ignited with sparks.

Author: Johann Wolfgang Goethe
Quote: A man sees in the world what he carries in his heart.

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote: The heights charm us, but the steps do not; with the mountain in our view we love to walk the plains.

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote: We can always redeem the man who aspires and strives.

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote: If I accept you as you are, I will make you worse; however if I treat you as though you are what you are capable of becoming, I help you become that.

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote: If you would create something, you must be something.

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: We don't grow older, we grow riper.
