Quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find us working.

Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.

Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote: Never permit a dichotomy to rule your life, a dichotomy in which you hate what you do so you can have pleasure in your spare time. Look for a situation in which your work will give you as much happiness as your spare time.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: We all know that light travels faster than sound. That's why certain people appear bright until you hear them speak.

Author: Dave Lavinsky
Quote: Start at the end.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: A lot of people pray for power, house, financial breakthrough, wealth etc. But only few ask God for wisdom. There are so many great power pack man and women of God who lack wisdom.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: A man with wisdom will always have a solution no matter how big his challenges may be. Wisdom makes you a problem solver.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: All my pains has always increased my sense of purpose.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: All of my life God has allowed me to share prospective with people who are different. You cannot lead people whose prospective you are not willing to understand.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: All the failures in my life freed me from all my fears so that I can succeed.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Any bridge you refuse to burn gives Satan an invitation and re-entry point into your life.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Any day God removes His hand from you, you are finished. Your hope and trust is only in Him. Your confidence, your strength, your power and your life is in God. There is no better life without Him. Look around the world and you will understand me.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Any prophet who does not refer you to Christ is not a true prophet.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Anything that doubt me can t doubt my God. Any situation that is too high for me can never be too high for my God.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Be careful because God's gifts alone are not able to give you joy; God's gift can only bring you joy when they are joined with your gratitude.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Be careful the mistake of yesterday always lives with tomorrow.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Before Marriage opposite attracts, after marriage opposite attacks . Just telling you the truth.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Being married or being in a close relationship is not based on how quickly you can get offended but on how you are ready to drop the offences, get over it and move ahead.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Blind minds are worst than blind eyes. That you have eyes does not mean that you have vision. Visionaries do not look they see while people look.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Cheap food always requires expensive treatment.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Christianity is not for seasonal use, it is for daily use. Make the word of God your daily Language.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Christians believe in a big God but do small things and this is a big insult to God.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Christians we cannot be allowed to be fractured at a time like this. There are more of us, there are more of light in us than in the agents of darkness.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Conflict is much the same, injustice and inequality is nothing new to our generation only the contest has changed because not only that everyone has opinion but they also have an opportunity to voice it and that is a bit dangerous.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Dear Lord please show me what really matters so that I may be able to determine what is distraction and God's direction in my life.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Do you know where your breakthrough begins? Your breakthrough begins where your excuses ends.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Do you want to acquire God's own wisdom? Relate with the Holy Spirit. Be a seeker of divine guidance by the Holy Spirit. You can't be a man or woman of solution without God.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Don't think because you can't affect something at a great level that God can't use you in a great way. David didn't even train one day with the armies but He won the war. He didn't even have a weapon but he killed a giant.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Even with fasting and prayers you still need wisdom. At the root of every great accomplishment is wisdom. In all your getting get wisdom first.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Every crisis is a wisdom crisis. If you have no peace around you then you lack wisdom.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Evil is real but God is greater.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Faith is never connected to safe. There is no faith without tension. For a rubber band to function to it's elasticity, it has to experience a tension. Saints of God who has no tension has no function.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Faith to challenge equals recovery. When you learn to challenge your situation God speaks.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Five minutes after something happened might not be the best time for you to get into your Facebook and tell everybody. Men's panic does not produce God's power.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Freedom comes from focus, focus brings freedom. Focus on fear you will always be in prison, focus on faith and is nothing the world can keep you knocked down.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: God always have a perfect way for every imperfect situations.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: God always sees me with no make-ups on because He knew how we started.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: God always wants us to see things from heaven's prospective. You may not be doing much to your community but what you are is so important. You are significant.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: God didn't call me to kill me. He called me to glory and virtue. My body has dropped on His feet to follow me home no more. Who the son of God set free is free indeed.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: God is not interested in helping you finding out why you are in a mess, He is interested in fixing it.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: God made my enemies to serve me in my absence. God made the things that conspired to destroy me feed me into the place that He was preparing for me. I am a big girl and I can handle trouble and my enemies.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: God sends the best to those who deserves it.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: God takes two and make them one but Satan takes one and make it two.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: God wants to use you right where you are with what you have not what you do not have.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: God's perspectives requires persistence. To have God's perspective in the world we live in requires persistence.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: God's voice will be heard in the cave but only His visions will be revealed to you on the mountain. (A bit deep). God will always love you and will always speak to you but when you lose your perspective, you won't see his plan.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: God's word will produce with your level of understanding. The much you can understand it, the more wisdom you are privileged to have.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Gratitude without practicing maybe like practicing a faith without good work. A grateful heart is not enough without a grateful habit; because your joy is not produced by what you put in your heart but by habit you put in your life.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Have you ever asked yourself this question "what can God do through me?" The preacher has no platform if the people has no sense of mission.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Hope, strive and try to be more like Christ until the day we will see Him. Let Him find you faithfully and in obedient serving Him. He is coming quicker than people think.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I am so glad that God's disappointment in me is not greater than his love and I still have a Destiny. I am growing in grace and mercy because that is the only soil that can produce the kind of life that God desires.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I am the most important person to me. I am the most important person in the entire universe to me. I am the center of my own universe.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I believe that to be kept from evil is better than to be healed from sickness.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I didn't come from a success lineage but I am so glad that my earthly lineage is not my final story because when I gave my life to Jesus twelve years back, God interrupted my story.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I didn't get to God by effort or title, I got there by invitation. God can lift you quickly if you let Him. He really cares.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I do not have any trust fund, I have always trusted God for all my funds.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I do not need to grow up or train in the gym in order to beat the devil, when I know that my God can beat him for me.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I don't just have only the peace of God, I do also have a God who gives peace, not just resources but the revelation of His presence.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I don't want to settle down because God has satisfied me and heard my prayers. I want to stay hungry and thirsty for the things of God.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I have graduated to the extent of not asking what is happening in my life because I trust the maker(God).

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I have learned to thank God for what I cannot see, I have learned to trust God with what I cannot.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I have lived long enough to know that wherever there is crisis there is always Christ. Look for Jesus in the middle of all your crisis. Whenever He comes the whole storm goes down.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I have lived long enough to see God make my enemies my footstool not even footsteps.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I have my priorities and I know my purpose. I do not Praise God because of my pain but I praise Him because of what the pain is producing.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I have the mind of Christ. The best life you could ever live is the one that your creator destined you for. The one He made you for. He has given us everything we need ......... to become like Him. To reach to your potentials. Worship Him in spirit and in truth.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I think it will be better if we can live our life as if Christ is going to return today and plan our live as if it is hundred years off. Keep living, serving and most of all be prepared.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: I would rather have a man chasing JESUS than a house full of stuffs and garage filled with big cars.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If God can help us locate demands, He can also help us locate the leaks.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If God give you a status, don't turn yourself to a statue. Don't become a monument. God still want to reside inside you but not in a monument.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If I should be available to everyone, I will eventually end up with nothing to give to anyone. So the greatest gift you can receive from me is my time. Count yourself lucky if I give you a minute of my hour.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If knowledge is lacking, your destruction is inevitable. Hosea 4:6

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If Satan succeeds in blinding your mind, he has succeeded in arresting you because anything that can stop you from believing can stop your future.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If the word of God cannot do it in your life then your Pastor must be wasting his time.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If want to become a person with vision, get back and reconnect to your source.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If you are landing it doesn't really matter who is sitting beside you but while you are taking off, it is very important you know who is around you. Eagles don't flock with pigeons.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If you are looking for bad news ask new york times or CNN, if you are looking for good news ask me. I am an ambassador of good news.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If you ask me I think the greatest breakthrough each and everyone of us need is not on finance, marriage, work, relationship, own house, car but self. The first breakthrough should start from being selfish.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If you can feed in the presence of your enemies, if you can be blessed under the weight of burdens, when you praise God in pain, it is preparation for provision.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If you can't see the assets in you, it will be hard for you to export it to the world. Recognize who you are and the world will recognize you.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: If you never listen, you can't see. The devil has got so many people so disconnected that they cannot even listen or even sense when the Lord is speaking.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: In dealing with us, God always starts with our motives. What do you want for the people? What does God wants for his people? What do you want Him to do for you; that's is a starting place.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: In God's presence I find peace that is much deeper than any disappointment. I will grow and I understand I can't grow myself, that is why I need God and His grace.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: In politics no permanent friends, no permanent enemies but permanent interest.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Is it not funny, in the presence of an unlimited God, we will still be stucked? Sometimes faith overwrites the fact, that some people have not come to realize. Stop giving excuses and telling God what is happening around you. You have the tools.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: It is impossible to enjoy divine protection without the word of God. You must be a word addict.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: It is not your duty to run from the devil but resist him and he will flew from you.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: It is weird to me on how people will come to church frequently and have absolutely no desire or intention to change anything about their life based on what they experienced in the church.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: It's when your plans look dead that God's resurrection power begins to operate in your life in greater measure

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Learn to eat with your enemies all around you but most of all thank God for his presence. Keep your eyes fixed to the presence of God in the presence of your enemies.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Long before something happens in our life, it happened in our heart.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Man may change, government may change, people may change but Jesus Christ is the same yesterday, today and forever.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Man's panic does not produce God's power.....sometimes you need to pray before you post on social media.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: My advice for those of you who felt being marginalized, undervalued and taken for granted; guess what? That is the Arena where God creates Leaders.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: My faith gives me the ability to say, whatever is next, I'm ready. If it is Hillary or Trump I am ready because they might sit on the desk but they do not sit on the throne.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Negative prophecies are reversible. The Lord reveals to conquer. You are created to reverse any negative with your prayers and the word of God.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: No man's advice can change you unless you speak to yourself. Bible school or seminars can't change you, going to church can't change you except you decide to change. Psalm 139:23 - 24

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: No Satan can unsettle what God has settled.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Nobody is too holy for the devil's attack, even your tithes and offerings won't stop him either but God rebukes the devourer through your giving.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Nothing is over in my life when Christ is above it. Anything higher than me is still below the feet of Christ. I am not born again to be burnt, I am born again to be born again so that I may live in peace and joy that comes only from God.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Offence is an event, offended is a decision. Offence and offended we have to live through it but to stay offended? To live in that place denies the very nature of the salvation that you claimed to have received.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Our life is not in stuff, focus your attention on Christ where it should be. Prosperity and wealth has damaged the body of Christ. God takes pleasure in the prosperity of his children but don't replace him with material.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: People run around looking for millions of likes in their life and on the social media but do you know what? If you get just one true like from just one who loves you the most, it surpasses all other millions. God loves you the most even without make over.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: People would want to get safe and come to Christ because they see the evidence in your life not because you quote the scriptures to them.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Poor means when we lack things in our lives. There are two types of poverty. ...those that need food and shelter and those that need God in their lives. We are called to service to help both group of people as much as we can.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Poverty I am too beautiful to be like you. Sickness from the crown of my head to the sole of my feet, I belong to God.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Real faith looks beneath the surface. Real faith knows that faith works sometimes in dark places. Real faith knows that sometimes in order to see a change, you will have to steer through your situation to really see it.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Rebuilding is something that is practically difficult than starting over from nothing.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Satan can't prevail against you when you know God's Word and stand on it. So have your It is written' armor ready. Build yourself up on the Word of God before the attack comes.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: School does not make people, it is learning that makes people great, that is why you see first class students fail and poor. The world is not ruled by those who went to school, it is ruled by those who learn everyday.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: See it (your situations) with your eyes but direct it to God

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: So long as you are in God's hands, He will not throw you away. God cannot drop you for you to be ashamed.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Some people are disappointed in their life because they are trying to use the tools that God did not authorized them to use in their life, trying to build on a purpose that is not even attached in their personality.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Some people are in church but not in Christ because if you are in Christ, the first sign of true Christianity is peace.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Some people want to kill goliath but they do not want to attend to sheep. How can God use you to kill giants if you cannot follow simple instructions?

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Sometimes God wraps destiny in what we perceive as just another day. The same day that David's father asked him to go and deliver bread to his brothers in the field was the same day that God used him to bring goliath down. Take every minute in your life serious.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Sometimes the fact that you can't sense God isn't an indication that He is not there. It is just an indication that you are hanging out in the wrong place. The cave is not a physical location, it is a state of mind.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Sometimes we are asking God to reveal his presence, provisions and purpose in our lives and we pray like we are trying to get God's attention but I think prayer has less with getting God's attention but He getting mine.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Sometimes we want God to use us to do big things when we would not even want to do the basics.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Sometimes what not to do is more important than what to do. Sometimes when you are in crisis, when frustration are high or when you are under pressure, what you don't do is more important than what you do. Don't be afraid. ....

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Stop praying to God to change your marriage or your finances because you might end up seeing that you are the one that need the change not your marriage or finances.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Stop telling God what you want to have , He is going to use what you have left to give you what you need.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Surrounded by enemies, surrounded by evil, surrounded by darkness, injustice......."don't be afraid , those who are with us are more than those who are with them" 2 Kings 6:16

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Take anything that is above you to God, lift it, bless it and release it and see what God will do.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Thank God #EVEN# #THOUGH# in bad times not only in your good; this is a graduated form of gratitude.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: That you are a born again Christian does not mean you will automatically succeed except you follow God's principles. Never forget faith without good work is dead.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: The agenda of the Media is not to inform you, they don't care about you, they are trying to show you the truth. There are some intelligent Christians but they can't find them and put on the air ...for instance me

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: The church preach so much about power in the kingdom of God but we don't talk about wisdom. Everybody goes for power forgetting that power without wisdom can be disastrous.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: The conflict hasn't gotten worst but the contest has really changed.............

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: The devil comes to steal, kill and destroy and his followers do the same. Be watchful and keep that in mind.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: The enemies agenda is destruction, his strategy is division and his tactics is on little differences. Mind you he is not going to be happy until he sees you divided.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: The forgiveness of God flows through me and because I am forgiven, I can forgive.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: The money you are looking for is not in any country, PhD or your designer outlook, it is in wisdom. Solomon never prayed for wealth but he asked for wisdom.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: The more desperate the situation, the more opportunity for miracle. If you need something from God, you need to be at the right place, the right position and at the right time

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: The presence of crisis does not prove the absence of God. I think in time of crisis Christians should rise up and point to the world on something bigger. The crisis is an opportunity for us to proclaim to the children of darkness what we proclaim in the light.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: The size of a plane does not change the weather but it will get you above it. The size of your faith may not change your situation but it will get you over it.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: The things I call crisis and all the things that were coming after me are all coming to serve the purpose of God in my life.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: There are too many stars in the sky and none of them is overshadowing the other. Don't let anybody be a threat to your growth.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: There is a miracle in your mess, don't let the mess make you miss the miracle.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: There is a remedy and there is a hope but the remedy is not in the political party or in places that will take you away from hope. You better run to God, that is the only place you can find both.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: There is a throne up there and someone is sitting on it. It is not you, the economy or your government. My God is still on the throne and I shall not worry.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: There is no gift of principles, you must apply them if you want to move forward.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: There is no where that life problem can take you that God's presence cannot reach you. There is nothing that people can do to you that can keep God from getting to you.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: There is nothing good in the devil and there is nothing bad in God and with God all things are possible . And all things are possible to those that believe.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: There is power in the word of God if used properly.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: There must always be an opposition because the enemy always opposes what the Lord has declared.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: There must be a demand, there must be an urge and there must be a will and where there is a demand and a will, there will also be a way.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: There's supposed to be more value in your life than spending more than sixty hours in a week in a place you don't care about and in an environment they don't care about you.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: This is not the first time that the world has been in a mess but you are still God, you left us on the earth, not only to preach in a building but to be the church beyond the buildings.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Unless you acknowledge your vulnerability for sin, you won't pray against it and you'll end up experiencing defeat. The most effective weapon the enemy has against you - is you

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: We are so much distracted nowadays. There is so much distractions in the world today call it internet, media, football matches etc. but don't let it consume you.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: What starts in the heart doesn't stay in the heart, it either turn into action or words.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: What you need is not too big for God to supply.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: What you need to succeed is already there, just lean on God. For your faith's sake, God can still disappoint the devil.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: What you see and what you listen to will determine how high you will go.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: When I call on God, I am not trying to get his attention and I am not trying to get Him to notice me. In all this my journey with Him two questions usually comes to my mind, they are; am I paying attention to him or am I trying to get his attention?

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: When next the devil attack you apply your break; resist the devil and he will flew from you. The bible didn't say you should run from the devil but resist him.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: When we are preoccupied with wealth and material acquisitions, it chokes God's word in us and makes it unfruitful. But if we follow His plan of being prosperous you will enjoy the blessings of this life.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: When wisdom comes, transformation comes. Wisdom makes the difference between the succeeding man and the failing man.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: When you do away with God you become your own god, because you recognize no greater power in the universe than yourself.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: When you go nearer to God, He shows you what to do, He tells you when to do it and He backs whatever He promised.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: When you leave where God is sending you to somewhere else, your star will varnish. A lesson to learn here....don't go to Herod's house when you are looking for Jesus.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: When you praise God in pain, it is preparing you for provision.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Whenever someone is a threat to the enemy there will be an attack dispatched against that person to try to minimize their effectiveness.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Whenever you are in transition it is always important to choose the words that you use. You call it crises in your life and I call it transition.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Wherever problem persist, wisdom is lacking. There is no problem anywhere except wisdom problem. Wisdom provides solutions where there is complications.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Wisdom cannot be bought from the Wal-Mart, it can only come from the Holy Spirit of God.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Wisdom is knowing the right thing to do and doing it at the right time to get the desired result. It is also the correct application of knowledge.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Wisdom is the mother of solutions. You cannot upgrade in wisdom and lack solutions and you cannot have a wisdom and be stranded in any challenge you face.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: Without you discovering your true picture, it will be hard to have a glorious future. It is the discovery of what you have inside and the pursuit of it that can guarantee a glorious future

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: You can never experience peace until you tell the devil that you are a child of God. CNN or BBC won't do that for you. My bible says if I should say to this mountain, let thou be removed. It didn't say if I should fall, cry or fail but if I should say.......

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: You can prophecy without going to the bible school. If you acknowledge Jesus, you receive the gift of prophecy and you can prophecy. The holy spirit is always there for you.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: You can win war without fighting and you must not fight a war in order to win. The battle is of the Lord.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: You cannot have a dream and expect someone else's faith to make it a reality for you.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: You cannot occupy a proper place on earth without wisdom. It is the principal thing you must have.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: You cannot use another man's leg to run your race. Wives stop waiting for your husbands to do everything. For God's sake make an impact. Nobody is a threat to your development.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: You can't disappoint what God has appointed.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: You can't stop Satan from doing his job; his job is to steal, kill and destroy but don't let him stop you from doing your own job; and your job is to bind and lose his stronghold. His job is to destroy you and your job is to destroy him too. Cast him out.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: You don't have to feel grateful in order to be grateful.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: You have a standing invitation to experience God's presence but you have to pay attention because attention creates access.

Author: Patience Johnson
Quote: You will always end up in frustration whenever you try to produce outside your purpose.

Author: Paul  Lockhart
Quote: SIMPLICIO: ... You have to [learn to] walk before you can run. SALVIATI: No, you have to have something you want to run toward.

Author: Paul "Bear" Bryant
Quote: If anything goes bad, I did it. If anything goes semi-good, then we did it. If anything goes really good, then you did it.

Author: Paul H. Dunn
Quote: You may be on the right track, but if you just sit there you'll get run over.

Author: Paul Harvey
Quote: Someday I hope to enjoy enough of what the world calls success so that someone will ask me, 'What's the secret of it?' I shall say simply this: 'I get up when I fall down.'

Author: Paul J. Meyer
Quote: Enter every activity without giving mental recognition to the possibility of defeat. Concentrate on your strengths, instead of your weaknesses ... on your powers, instead of your problems.

Author: Paul J. Meyer
Quote: Success is the progressive realization of worthwhile, predetermined, personal goals.

Author: Paul J. Meyer
Quote: The only honest measure of your success is what you are doing compared to your true potential.

Author: Paul J. Meyer
Quote: Whatever you vividly imagine, ardently desire, sincerely believe, and enthusiastically act upon must inevitably come to pass!

Author: Paul Kearly
Quote: Your ideas are like diamonds. Without the refining process, they are just a dirty rock, but by cutting away the impurities, they become priceless.

Author: Paul McCartney
Quote: I used to think anyone doing anything weird was weird. Now I know that it is the people that call others weird that are weird.

Author: Paul Tillich
Quote: He who risks and fails can be forgiven. He who never risks and never fails is a failure in his whole being.

Author: Paula Antonia Purpera
Quote: Failure and Success are two sides of the same coin. One does not exist without the other.

Author: Pauline Seaport
Quote: Have a dream or vision? Keep striving toward it, never give up on it, pray about it and ask God to bless it. And no matter who doesn't believe or understand it, it's because it's not for them, it's for YOU.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: If you start by promising what you don't even have yet, you'll lose your desire to work towards getting it.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: Nothing in the world is ever completely wrong. Even a stopped clock is right twice a day.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: To realize one's destiny is a person's only real obligation and when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.

Author: Perle Thompson
Quote: There are two kinds of failures: The man who will do nothing he is told, and the man who will do nothing else.

Author: Persian Proverb
