Quote: Always remember people who have helped you along the way, and don't forget to lift someone up.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Be Brave and Take Risks: You need to have faith in yourself. Be brave and take risks. You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Be careful the stories you're telling yourself about your current circumstances; a head full of negative thoughts has no space for positive ones.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue your goals. If you aren't grateful for what you already have, what makes you think you would be happy with more.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Be the positive impact on someone's life.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Be the positive impact on the lives of others.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Be where you are, stop over-thinking, and focus on what you are doing.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Be with someone who inspires you and makes you be the best version of yourself.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Beliefs are choices. First you choose your beliefs. Then your beliefs affect your choices.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself. Believe in yourself, your abilities and your own potential. Never let self-doubt hold you captive. You are worthy of all that you dream of and hope for.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Challenge and adversity are meant to help you know who you are. Storms hit your weakness, but unlock your true strength.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Change course, but don't give up.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Change may not always bring growth, but there is no growth without change.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Changing your outside world cannot make you happy if you are an unhappy person. The real personal change can only happen from the inside out. If you firstly create the change within yourself, you can turn your life around.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Comfort zone: simply means the routine of one's daily life it is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Consistency is the true foundation of trust. Either keep your promises or do not make them.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Courage is feeling fear, not getting rid of fear, and taking action in the face of fear.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Create a vision for the life you really want and then work relentlessly towards making it a reality.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Create your own miracles; do what you think you cannot do.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Dedicate yourself to what gives your life true meaning and purpose; make a positive difference in someone's life.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event. Discipline your mind to think positively; to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event. Discipline your mind to think positively; to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Discipline Your Mind to Think Positively: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Do more listening than talking; talk more about them than about you.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Do not be complacent about your achievements and not to strive for continual improvement when you get to the top. As soon as you let success go to your head, you sink into following familiar patterns and play it safe. In other words, you risk losing your edge.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart; do not let compliments go to your head and criticisms to your heart; do not let success go to your head and failure to your heart.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Do not let the memories of your past limit the potential of your future. There are no limits to what you can achieve on your journey through life, except in your mind.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Do not let your negative thoughts have power over you because those thoughts will end up controlling your life. No one can live a positive life with a negative mind.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Do not rest on your laurels when you get to the top; you risk losing your edge once you let success go to your head.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Do what you love, love what you do, and with all your heart give yourself to it.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Don't let others tell you what you can't do. Don't let the limitations of others limit your vision. If you can remove your self-doubt and believe in yourself, you can achieve what you never thought possible.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Don't let your emotions get in the way of rational decision making.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Don't wait for the right moment to start, start and make each moment right.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Don't wait for things to happen. Make them happen.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Dream big. Wake up. Take the first step into the unknown.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Each day brings new opportunities, allowing you to constantly live with love. Be there for others. Bring a little light into someone's day. Be grateful and live each day to the fullest.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Enthusiasm can help you find the new doors, but it takes passion to open them. If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Every challenge you face today makes you stronger tomorrow. The challenge of life is intended to make you better, not bitter.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Every choice comes with a consequence. Once you make a choice, you must accept responsibility. You cannot escape the consequences of your choices, whether you like them or not.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Everyone's time is limited. What matters most is to focus on what matters most.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Failure is a bend in the road, not the end of the road. Learn from failure and keep moving forward.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Failures are the stairs we climb to reach success.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Finding the lesson behind every adversity will be the one important thing that helps get you through it.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Focus on making choices to lead your life that aligns with your core values in the most purposeful way possible.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Focus on your goals, not your fear. Focus like a laser beam on your goals.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Focus on your strengths, not your weaknesses. Focus on your character, not your reputation. Focus on your blessings, not your misfortunes.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Goals are the road maps that guide you to your destination. Cultivate the habit of setting clearly-defined written goals; they are the road maps that guide you to your destination.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Good people see the good and bring out the best in other people.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Good things happen in your life when you surround yourself with positive people.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Great goals make great people. People cannot hit what they do not aim for.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Great leaders can see the greatness in others when they can't see it themselves and lead them to their highest potential they don't even know.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Great Leaders Create More Leaders Good leaders have vision and inspire others to help them turn vision into reality. Great leaders create more leaders, not followers. Great leaders have vision, share vision, and inspire others to create their own.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Great leaders create more leaders, not followers.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Great things happen to those who don't stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: If you believe very strongly in something, stand up and fight for it.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: If you care about something enough, you'll find a way to make it happen.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: If you compromise your core values, you go nowhere.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: If you don't give up on something you truly believe in, you will find a way.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Instead of complaining about the problem and blaming others, start finding the solution.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Instead of worrying about what could go wrong, change your thoughts to what could go right. When you change the negative thought into a positive one, it eliminates the negative one.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Integrity is doing what is right and truthful, and doing as you say you would do.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: It doesn't matter how many times you get knocked down. All that matters is you get up one more time than you were knocked down.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: It is better to find your courage to make changes when you can choose to rather than being forced to. If you do not make change, change will make you.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: It is difficult to make the right choice if you fear choosing wrongly.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: It takes guts and humility to admit mistakes. Admitting we're wrong is courage, not weakness.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: It takes sunshine and rain to make a rainbow. There would be no rainbows without sunshine and rain.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: It's never too late to change your life for the better. You don't have to take huge steps to change your life. Making even the smallest changes to your daily routine can make a big difference to your life.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: It's only after you've stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Keep Going Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going. Tough situations build strong people in the end.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Keep your promises and be consistent. Be the kind of person others can trust.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Leaders are limited by their vision rather than by their abilities.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Learning to focus on the big picture will help you keep things in a proper perspective.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Let go of something old that no longer serves you in order to make room for something new.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Life is short. Focus on what really matters most. You have to change your priorities over time.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Life is short. Focus on what really matters most; you should change your priorities over time.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Life teaches us the right path is rarely the easy one.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Live the Life of Your Dreams When you start living the life of your dreams, there will always be obstacles, doubters, mistakes and setbacks along the way. But with hard work, perseverance and self-belief there is no limit to what you can achieve.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Live the Life of Your Dreams: Be brave enough to live the life of your dreams according to your vision and purpose instead of the expectations and opinions of others.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Make the most of the best and the best of the worst, and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Make the most of what you have and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses in your life; you realize everything that happens in life is a result of the previous choice you've made and start making new choices to change your life.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses, and start making changes.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: More smiling, less worrying. More compassion, less judgment. More blessed, less stressed. More love, less hate.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Never let fear hold you captive. Never let self-doubt hold you captive. Never let frustration hold you captive.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Never stop dreaming, never stop believing, never give up, never stop trying, and never stop learning.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: No matter how much experience you have, there's always something new you can learn and room for improvement.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Once you realize you deserve a bright future, letting go of your dark past is the best choice you will ever make.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important. Most people enjoy those rare moments when others make them feel important. It is one of the deepest human desires.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: One of the best ways to influence people is to make those around you feel important.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: One word of encouragement can be enough to spark someone's motivation to continue with a difficult challenge.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Patience, more than the ability to bear pains or endure waiting, is to be calm no matter what happens constantly take action to turn it to positive growth opportunities and have faith to believe that it will all work out in the end while you are waiting.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: People are successful because they think and act like successful people.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eyes.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Real change is difficult at the beginning, but gorgeous at the end. Change begins the moment you get the courage and step outside your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Remember that things are not always as they appear to be. Curiosity creates possibilities and opportunities.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Shine your light and make a positive impact on the world; there is nothing so honorable as helping improve the lives of others.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Step out of your comfort zone. Comfort zones, where your unrealized dreams are buried, are the enemies of achievement. Leadership begins when you step outside your comfort zone.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Stop comparing yourself to others. Always strive to improve yourself to become better today than you were yesterday to serve those around you and the world.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Stop doing what is easy or popular. Start doing what is right.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Stop doing what is easy. Start doing what is right.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Stop giving other people the power to control your happiness, your mind, and your life. If you don't take control of yourself and your own life, someone else is bound to try.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Strive to make small changes and learn something new daily, because there is always these experiences you have had to tap into for the future.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Strong people have a strong sense of self-worth and self-awareness; they don't need the approval of others.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Surround Yourself with People Who Believe in Your Dreams: Surround yourself with people who believe in your dreams, encourage your ideas, support your ambitions, and bring out the best in you.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: The beginning is always NOW.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure. You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: The level of success you achieve will be in direct proportion to the depth of your commitment.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: The more you believed in yourself, the more you could trust yourself. The more you trust yourself, the less you compare yourself to others.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: The more you can have control over your ego rather than let it run amuck, the more successful you'll be in all areas of life.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: The more you talk about them, the more important they will feel. The more you listen to them, the more important you will make them feel.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: The one who falls and gets up is stronger than the one who never tried. Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: The strongest people find the courage and caring to help others, even if they are going through their own storm.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: The value of surrounding yourself with positive people is not what you get from them, but how good a person you have become because of them.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: There are some values that you should never compromise on to stay true to yourself; you should be brave to stand up for what you truly believe in even if you stand alone.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: There is no more profitable investment than investing in yourself. It is the best investment you can make; you can never go wrong with it. It is the true way to improve yourself to be the best version of you and lets you be able to best serve those around you.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: There is nothing so convincing as a thing well done.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: There is nothing so eloquent as a thing well done.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Those who win never give up. Those who give up never win.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Those who win never give up; those who give up never win.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Those who win never quit. Those who quit never win.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Those who win never quit; those who quit never win.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: To have what you have never had, you have to do what you have never done.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: To learn something new, you need to try new things and not be afraid to be wrong.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: To overcome fear is the quickest way to gain your self-confidence.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Turn obstacles into opportunities and problems into possibilities.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Turn your obstacles into opportunities and your problems into possibilities.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Until you change how you get things done, you'll never know what works best.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: We all have negative thoughts now and then, but we can choose not to dwell there and not to let them control us.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: We have to do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: What helps you persevere is your resilience and commitment.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: What you stay focused on will grow.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: What's done is done. What's gone is gone. One of life's lessons is always moving on. It's okay to look back to see how far you've come but keep moving forward.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: When the going gets tough, put one foot in front of the other and just keep going. Don't give up.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: When things do not go your way, remember that every challenge every adversity contains within it the seeds of opportunity and growth.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: When you begin to do what matters most to you, you let go of preconceived notions of who you are which have been fostered by others and start creating the person you most want to be.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: When you start giving, instead of getting, you make a difference. You can always give a warm smile, a sincere hello, a positive vibe your attention, your time, your love, and kindness to those around you.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: When you take control of your attitude, you take control of your life.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: You Are the Master of Your Attitude You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control the way you think about all the events. You always have a choice. You can choose to face them with a positive mental attitude.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: You attract who you are being. When you work at being the type of person that you want to attract, you attract those kinds of people into your life.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: You can have everything you want if you can put your heart and soul into everything you do.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: You cannot change anyone, but you can be the reason someone changes.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: You have come a long way and have won many battles. Whenever you're faced with a difficult or challenging situation, you'll overcome it. Yes, you can.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: You have two choices, to conquer your fear or to let your fear conquer you.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: You learn something valuable from all of the significant events and people, but you never touch your true potential until you challenge yourself to go beyond imposed limitations.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: You make the world a better place by making daily improvements to become the best version of yourself.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: You need to have faith in yourself. Be brave and take risks. You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: You were born to stand out, stop trying to fit in.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Your beliefs affect your choices. Your choices shape your actions. Your actions determine your results. The future you create depends upon the choices you make and the actions you take today.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Your beliefs affect your choices. Your choices shape your actions. Your actions determine your results. The future you create depends upon the decisions you make and actions you take today.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Your beliefs are decisions; they are choices. First you choose your beliefs. Then your beliefs affect your choices.

Author: Roy T. Bennett
Quote: Your values create your internal compass that can navigate how you make decisions in your life. If you compromise your core values, you go nowhere.

Author: Rupert Murdoch
Quote: In motivating people, You've got to engage their minds and their hearts. I motivate people, I hope, by example - and perhaps by excitement, by having productive ideas to make others feel involved.

Author: Russian Proverb
Quote: One who seeks no friends is his own enemy.

Author: RVM
Quote: A moment spent in Sorrow or a moment spent in Pain is a waste of a Great Treasure that you will never get again.

Author: RVM
Quote: A rainbow in the sky or a bird that can fly often create Joy that money can't buy!

Author: RVM
Quote: A woman was counting her grams of gold in Sorrow while another, who had nothing, still counted her Blessings in Joy. Happiness is not what you HAVE, but how you FEEL.

Author: RVM
Quote: Allow yourself the Freedom to Fail before you see Success Sail!-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: An external motive can never Inspire you. It will only Motivate you to move, but you will soon stop. Seek Inspiration!

Author: RVM
Quote: An external motive can never Inspire you. It will only Motivate you to move, but you will soon stop. Seek Inspiration!-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Anybody can Earn and Die, leaving a will and legacy. Only the courageous ones can give away all they have while they are Alive.

Author: RVM
Quote: Anyone can exist. Most fools do. It takes guts to truly Live.

Author: RVM
Quote: Anyone can exist. Most fools do. It takes guts to truly Live. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Birds fly in the sky without the fear of fall. We too must have the Courage to take Risks and grow tall.

Author: RVM
Quote: Carrying a grudge in your heart or in your mind is like carrying a bunch of thorns on your body. You are just choosing to prick yourself with it.

Author: RVM
Quote: Celebrate Life. To truly live, Celebrate each day of Life. Let each day be a Festival of Joy.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Contentment is the foundation of true Happiness. The Happiness that comes from fulfilling desires can never be permanent.

Author: RVM
Quote: Contentment is the foundation of true Happiness. The Happiness that comes from fulfilling desires can never be permanent.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Dance before the music is over. Live before your Life is over.

Author: RVM
Quote: Dance before the music is over. Live before your Life is over. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Dare to be different. The world is full of the ordinary.

Author: RVM
Quote: Dare to share for to Give is to truly Live.

Author: RVM
Quote: Dare to share for to Give is to truly Live. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Decide to be HAPPY when you start your day. Commit to put JOY in whatever comes your way. You may be hurt by what people say, but don't let anyone spoil your Day.- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Decide to be HAPPY when you start your day. Commit to put JOY in whatever comes your way. You may be hurt by what people say, but don't let anyone spoil your Day.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Do it because you WANT to, not just because you HAVE to. When you do what you want, you create an Unstoppable POWER.

Author: RVM
Quote: Do you earn for others to burn? Why not GIVE as you LIVE, so that when you die, the world will cry.

Author: RVM
Quote: Do you earn for others to burn? Why not GIVE as you LIVE, so that when you die, the world will cry. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Do you want to make your Life exciting? Then find a purpose that will make you jump out of bed each day with Enthusiasm, Power and Excitement.

Author: RVM
Quote: Do you want to make your Life exciting? Then find a purpose that will make you jump out of bed each day with Enthusiasm, Power and Excitement.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Don't be afraid of being Happy. You deserve to be Happy.

Author: RVM
Quote: Don't be afraid of being Happy. You deserve to be Happy. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Don't be amongst those trying to build a better Tomorrow. We can have a better tomorrow only if our Today is better than our Yesterday. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Don't be so busy making a living that you forget to enjoy your Life. Today, make a commitment to Enjoy Life.

Author: RVM
Quote: Don't expect people to always understand you. Instead, learn to understand them. Then Accept, Forgive & Love unconditionally. This is a sure way to be Happy.

Author: RVM
Quote: Don't just GO through life, GROW through it. For Life comes to you only once . . . never to return! Climb the Ladder of Life, step by step.

Author: RVM
Quote: Don't just GO through life, GROW through it. For Life comes to you only once, never to return! Climb the Ladder of Life, step by step.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Don't just Hurry, don't just Haste. Don't just Worry, don't just Waste. Life is a Treasure, Enjoy the Pleasure.- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Don't live a dull boring life. Spice it up. Have u realized that you wont live forever.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Don't lose today for today is guaranteed but tomorrow is not.

Author: RVM
Quote: Don't surrender your life to a Face, a Farce, a Fence or a Force. Don't be a Slave, be Brave.

Author: RVM
Quote: Enjoy the Bliss of just Being Without being dependent on anything!

Author: RVM
Quote: Enjoy the Bliss of just Being Without being dependent on anything! -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Even one day lost in misery is a great loss, for the day will never come back again. You lose 24 hours of happiness, joy & bliss. Live each day in happiness.

Author: RVM
Quote: Even one day lost in misery is a great loss, for the day will never come back again. You lose 24 hours of happiness, joy & bliss. Live each day in happiness. - RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Even with all the Lace, you can't be an Ace without God's grace.

Author: RVM
Quote: Even with all the Lace, you can't be an Ace without God's grace.- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Every good act is like a seed that we sow. We don't know what it will bear, but it will bear some fruit some day.

Author: RVM
Quote: Every moment of Life is a Challenge to Choose. Some Win, some Lose.

Author: RVM
Quote: Everybody counts the Happy ones Count their Blessings and the sad ones Count their Troubles.

Author: RVM
Quote: Everybody counts the Happy ones Count their Blessings and the sad ones Count their Troubles. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Everybody has to die. Why cry, when you have wings to fly!

Author: RVM
Quote: Everyday there will be an opportunity to Frown or to Smile, to Drown or to Dance, to be Sad or to be Glad. It's a Choice!

Author: RVM
Quote: Everyday there will be an opportunity to Frown or to Smile, to Drown or to Dance, to be Sad or to be Glad. It's a Choice!-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Faith gives Courage to the heart and Energy to the mind to make the Impossible Possible.

Author: RVM
Quote: Far greater than all the material possessions that I possess, is my Freedom to Choose, my Freedom to Live, and my Freedom to be Happy.

Author: RVM
Quote: Far greater than all the material possessions that I possess, is my Freedom to Choose, my Freedom to Live, and my Freedom to be Happy.- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Far more than the shield is the Pleasure I get on the field . . . the Joy of the chase is greater than the result of the race.

Author: RVM
Quote: Far more than the shield is the Pleasure I get on the field . . . the Joy of the chase is greater than the result of the race.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: First, know where you want to go. Then, go where you want to go. You are your own pilot and you can choose your Destination.

Author: RVM
Quote: For those who love what they do, even working 18 hours a day, 7 days a week is not work at all. It is just fun.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Forget about the Past; Don't worry about the Future; Live Today! -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Happiness does not come from making money. It comes from spending it. Most people are doing otherwise.

Author: RVM
Quote: Happiness does not come from making money. It comes from spending it. Most people are doing otherwise. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Happy New Year! How can the New Year be happy unless You are Happy? How can the New Year be New unless You are New? Resolve in 2-0-1-6 to be a New You and a Happy You and you will find 2016 to be a Happy New Year!- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Have a Blast; Life won't last! Make the Best of the Journey before it is over! -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Have you ever paused to be Grateful? For eyes to see, nose to smell, ears to hear, tongue to taste, hands to feel, head to think and heart to love?

Author: RVM
Quote: Have your own convictions. Believe in the laws of your conscience because if you believe in everything, you become nothing. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: He is a true King who has the Freedom to do anything!- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Hoping is a great Positive emotion and you must HOPE. But remember, you can't just Hope for Success, you also have to work for it.

Author: RVM
Quote: How can you get what you want if you do not know what you are seeking?

Author: RVM
Quote: How much you achieve in Life is not as important as how much you enjoy each moment of Life.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: I am not perfect. Are you? Let us accept the fact that nobody is perfect. Let us learn to accept our imperfections as well as those of others.

Author: RVM
Quote: I am the Richest man on earth because I am the Happiest man on earth. After all, isn't Happiness the Greatest Wealth in Life? -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: I have no time to Cry because my Focus is to Fly in the Sky!

Author: RVM
Quote: I used to worry about my Fears, but I realized that most of the time nothing bad happened. So, I have stopped worrying.

Author: RVM
Quote: I would rather live 10 years doing what I Love, than drag through Life 50 years, hating everyday I Live.

Author: RVM
Quote: I would rather live 10 years doing what I Love, than drag through Life 50 years, hating everyday I Live.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: I'd rather live one year with Love, Peace & Joy, than live 10 years with Worry, Anxiety & Hatred. It is not how long I live but how well I live.

Author: RVM
Quote: If happiness always depended on what we had, then the richest would always be Glad, not Sad.

Author: RVM
Quote: If happiness always depended on what we had, then the richest would always be Glad, not Sad.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: If something happens that causes you Pain, remind yourself that you can't get the Rainbow without a little Rain.

Author: RVM
Quote: If the past was what we were meant to see then behind, not in front, our eyes would be.

Author: RVM
Quote: If the past was what we were meant to see then behind, not in front, our eyes would be. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: If we can be Glad .........But we choose to be Sad, we are MAD! ! !- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: If you are not Happier than someone, you can't be Wealthier than him. True Wealth is the Joy that comes from being Content with what you have.

Author: RVM
Quote: If you celebrate Independence Day on just one day of the year, it only goes on to show that you are not truly Free . Learn to celebrate your Freedom every day!

Author: RVM
Quote: If you don't like the Fruits you are growing, then change the Seeds you are sowing.

Author: RVM
Quote: If you don't like the Fruits you are growing, then change the Seeds you are sowing. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: If you keep doing things that don't matter to you, you will not have time to do things that really do.

Author: RVM
Quote: If you let anyone tie your Wings with Strings, you can never Fly in the Sky! Your Independence, Your Freedom is Your Biggest Gift.

Author: RVM
Quote: If you live in Fear, Success will disappear.

Author: RVM
Quote: If you really want more, then cross the door and get to the shore.

Author: RVM
Quote: If you really want more, then cross the door and get to the shore. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: If your Life is full of Sorrow, then beg, steal, or borrow ENTHUSIASM from a great soul to make your Life whole.

Author: RVM
Quote: If your Life is full of Sorrow, then beg, steal, or borrow ENTHUSIASM from a great soul to make your Life whole. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: In life, some laugh, some cry, some live, some die. The choice is ours to crawl or to fly.

Author: RVM
Quote: In life, we must first learn to crawl, then stand, then walk, then run, and only then, fly. We cannot crawl into flying.

Author: RVM
Quote: In the journey of life, we pass pleasures & pain. There will be sunshine and rain; there will be loss and gain. But we must learn to smile again and again.

Author: RVM
Quote: In the pursuit of acquiring Treasures, we lose the ONE treasure that we truly possess Life. Let us not lose Life in the wild pursuit of other things.

Author: RVM
Quote: Inspiration creates a never-ending Power that makes you go on and on and on and on!

Author: RVM
Quote: Inspiration is that Power that makes you Seek and reach the Peak.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Inspiration moves one from Pessimism to Optimism, from Doubt to Faith, from Despair to Hope, and from Darkness to Light!

Author: RVM
Quote: Inspiration moves one from Pessimism to Optimism, from Doubt to Faith, from Despair to Hope, and from Darkness to Light!- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Instead of trying to understand Life, we must live it. Create a reason to Live and progress on that path every day.

Author: RVM
Quote: Introspect! Is your life moving forward or just moving like a pendulum?

Author: RVM
Quote: Introspect. Dive deep into your own Life and think . . .. Think . . . How have I lived? How can I make my Life better?

Author: RVM
Quote: INTROSPECT. Dive deep into your own Life and think...Think..."How have I lived ?" "How can I make my Life better?" -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: It doesn't cost much to be Happy if the currency of your heart is the blowing of the breeze and the swaying of the trees.

Author: RVM
Quote: It doesn't cost much to be Happy if the currency of your heart is the blowing of the breeze and the swaying of the trees. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: It is ironic that we are particular about flushing out all the dirt through the Drain, but we continue to retain a lot of it in our Brain.

Author: RVM
Quote: It is true that everyone has Problems, and it is also true that every problem has a Solution. If this is the reality of Life, then why not focus on solutions rather than Problems.

Author: RVM
Quote: It's a bet the more you Give, the more you will Get.

Author: RVM
Quote: It's a bet the more you Give, the more you will Get.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: It's great to earn, but don't leave it behind for someone else to burn.

Author: RVM
Quote: It's not Circumstance. It's not Chance. It's the Choice we make that determines the Destiny of Life. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Just because you are what you are, where you are, that does not mean you should continue to be there.

Author: RVM
Quote: Just because you have problems, it doesn't mean you should not have Dreams. Instead, let your Dreams become the scheme to solve your problems.

Author: RVM
Quote: Just like waves in the ocean come and go, no challenge is permanent. Problems will come and go too. We must enjoy the Challenges just like we enjoy the Waves.

Author: RVM
Quote: Learn to accept and bend like the willow. For if you resist, you will break like the oak.

Author: RVM
Quote: Learn to be Positive always. In pleasure or Pain, in Sun or Rain, in Loss or Gain, always be POSITIVE!

Author: RVM
Quote: Learn to surrender, because sometimes, when there is no way, surrender is the way.

Author: RVM
Quote: Let us not become so busy making a living that we forget to enjoy our Life. Every day of Life is meant to be Lived and Enjoyed.

Author: RVM
Quote: Let your Creed be to do a Good Deed. When your Focus is on your Need instead of your Greed, you will succeed.

Author: RVM
Quote: Life & Death are beyond our control. We can't control where, how, or when we are born & we can't control where, how, or when we may die. Then why Worry about it.

Author: RVM
Quote: Life has taught me that money is important, but it's not everything. For, if I have all the money in the world, but no time to enjoy, of what use is it?

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is a Canvas. Every action of ours is a stroke of paint and at the end, how beautiful our painting is will depend upon all our strokes, all our Actions.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is a maze. Don't just gaze. Change your pace, to win the race.

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is a Treasure Hunt and we all have the key to it. Unfortunately, many of us don't unlock it, but take the key to our grave.

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is like a river it keeps flowing, flowing, and flowing till it merges into the sea. Nothing can stop the flow of Life, but you can enjoy the Journey.

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is like an Hourglass. The grains of sand drop one by one and then it's all over. Live before you die.

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is like an Hourglass. The grains of sand drop one by one and then it's all over. Live before you die. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is made up of Moments. Moments create Days, days create Months, months create Years, years create LIFE. Lose the Moment and you lose Life.

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is not a puzzle to solve. Stop, Enjoy the Journey!-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is not a Race to Chase, but we realize it only when Death comes face-to-face .RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is not just to run and run, it is also not just to have fun. Life is complete when we get something worthwhile done.

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is too short to spend even one day in misery.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is your biggest Treasure. Enjoy it. If you forget to, it will soon be gone, never to return.

Author: RVM
Quote: Life is your biggest Treasure. Enjoy it. If you forget to, it will soon be gone, never to return.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Like a feather in the air, like a leaf in the sea, I surrender to Thee, I surrender to Thee.

Author: RVM
Quote: Live before the Journey is over, Live before it is too late. LIVE because you deserve to.

Author: RVM
Quote: Look around! People have faces with no smiles, as if they are carrying heavy baggage. Stop them! Give them a SMILE and see them Light up.

Author: RVM
Quote: Look at the people around you. Some Inspire you, some Perspire you. Be with those that build Energy in you.

Author: RVM
Quote: Look at yourself Are your eyes Twinkling? Is your heart Dancing? Are your lips Smiling? If yes, then you are truly enjoying Life.

Author: RVM
Quote: LOVE is meant to make you Happy, not sad. What's the use of Love, if it makes you mad!

Author: RVM
Quote: Making money may give a sense of Achievement. But making a difference will give a sense of Fulfillment.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Many people are hurt in Life. But the problem is not the hurt. They Curse, Nurse, and Rehearse their hurt instead of Reversing it, and Live miserably.

Author: RVM
Quote: Many people become prosperous only to realize the illusion that Success is more Fulfillment than Achievement.

Author: RVM
Quote: Most diseases are caused not so much by what we eat, but more by what is eating us.

Author: RVM
Quote: Most people lose the only thing they possess Life while acquiring the many things that will finally never be theirs.

Author: RVM
Quote: Move on, don't let the little things of Life hold you back. Forget, Forgive, and Move on.- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Never worry about the Past, it brings Tears. Don't think too much about the Future, it brings Fears. Live in the Present Moment with a Smile, it brings Cheers!!

Author: RVM
Quote: No one is born with Positive Passion. This Power is ignited by Inspiration!

Author: RVM
Quote: Nobody can steal your Peace of mind, but you can surely throw it away by letting negativity into your Life.

Author: RVM
Quote: Not truly living in the present moment & later regretting is like closing your eyes when a peacock is dancing, only to want to see it dance once it is gone.

Author: RVM
Quote: Nothing in this world is Good or Bad. Our thinking makes it so. A knife is good when a surgeon uses it to save a life & bad when a terrorist uses it to kill.

Author: RVM
Quote: Of course, things will go wrong. Move on! Don't let the little snags affect the progress of your life.

Author: RVM
Quote: Optimists anticipate problems, welcome them, and challenge them. Thus, eventually they defeat their problems.

Author: RVM
Quote: People are like pistachios. Some of them open up easily, but there are others who need to be really broken to get into.- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: People don't have Guts to leave their Ruts because of their ''Buts''.

Author: RVM
Quote: Play More, Pray More; Get More, Give More Live More!

Author: RVM
Quote: Play More, Pray More; Get More, Give More Live More! -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Positive Power can inspire; Negative Power can perspire. Which power are you on?

Author: RVM
Quote: Problems are everywhere, so are Solutions. Unfortunately, we see more of the Problems than the Solutions.

Author: RVM
Quote: Problems are like Balloons. We let them unnecessarily blow up.

Author: RVM
Quote: Problems are like Balloons. We let them unnecessarily blow up. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Purpose is that Power that will propel you to get out of bed each morning and push you to make your Dreams come true.

Author: RVM
Quote: Rather than wasting time on yesterday that is gone, it is better to invest your time in Tomorrow that is not yet born.

Author: RVM
Quote: Simple things make us Happy but we pursue the complicated. We get caught in a maze and Happiness remains a Distant Dream.

Author: RVM
Quote: Since there is no way to Live after you die, why not Live Now! -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Sky is not the limit if your heart is in it, for when you do something with all your heart, it just happens.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Smile all the While. Don't let miseries Pile! For life is just a Mile.

Author: RVM
Quote: Some people find life boring, there's too much time. Few find Life so exciting that there's no time at all and Life just zooms by

Author: RVM
Quote: Some people keep wandering aimlessly from womb to tomb. They seek nothing and achieve nothing. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Some people live such boring lives; it's Black & White, so dead! I choose to color my life with Fun, some Blue, some Green, some Red.

Author: RVM
Quote: Someone who lives meaningfully for 30 years has lived a much longer Life than one who drifted through Life for 60 years.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Success doesn't come from motivation. It comes from Inspiration. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: The Gift of Life is a Treasure. Some fill it with Pressure . . . some with Pleasure!-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: The irony is that we are busy doing many things that don't matter and we have no time for things that do. Shouldn't we reverse it?

Author: RVM
Quote: The Key to Happiness is to be FREE to BE what you want to BE!

Author: RVM
Quote: The only thing that belongs to us is our LIFE. Yet, we waste it in the pursuit of meaningless things that will never belong to us.- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: The past ruins the present to destroy the future. Take charge of the NOW.

Author: RVM
Quote: The Richest person is not the Happiest person, the Happiest person is the Richest person.

Author: RVM
Quote: The simplest way to Rejoice is to Count your Blessings and be grateful for them. You will automatically feel Joy in your Heart.

Author: RVM
Quote: The story of money is very funny. Others burn what we earn. Why not give as we live, so the world will cry when we die.

Author: RVM
Quote: The Sun challenges us to Shine, the Clouds remind us to Move, the Birds tell us we too can Fly and the Sky tells us that there is no limit to our Dreams and Goals.

Author: RVM
Quote: The Sun, the Moon, the Stars, the Birds, the Animals, the Flowers, are all proof that a Universal Power exists.

Author: RVM
Quote: The whole world is in constant motion. The earth moves, the clouds move, the waves move and we too must move. Move and reach the destination of your choice.

Author: RVM
Quote: The Wind that Blows, the Water that Flows, the Sun that Glows, are all proof that a Power exists. Believe and Experience the Universal Power.

Author: RVM
Quote: There are many who live Life in Fear, without taking risks. They don't take chances. Alas! Not only are they missing chances, they are missing Life itself! -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: There are people who are dancing through Life and others who are crying through Life. The irony is that Life is the same what we do is purely our Choice.

Author: RVM
Quote: There are people who Dream and there are people who Scream. There are people who Cry and there are people who Fly. The good news is that this is a CHOICE!-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: There can be no Positive result from a Negative attitude. Think Positive. Live Positive.

Author: RVM
Quote: There is nobody else on earth like you and me. Let us be who we are meant to be.

Author: RVM
Quote: There is nobody else on earth like you and me. Let us be who we are meant to be. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Think of Today, not Tomorrow. It's time to be Happy, not live a Life of Sorrow. Find out those things that make you Glad & eliminate those that make you Sad.

Author: RVM
Quote: Those who always think of their aches can never do what it takes!

Author: RVM
Quote: Those who Discover the High Sea are the ones who are FREE to Be what they Want to Be.

Author: RVM
Quote: Those who Discover the High Sea are the ones who are FREE to Be what they Want to Be. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Those who have the FREEDOM to Row can get to where they want to Go!

Author: RVM
Quote: Those who have the FREEDOM to Row can get to where they want to Go!- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Those who say I need Motivation will never create Inspiration that will take them to their Destination.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: To live with Faith, eliminate Fear. Only one can exist in our Life at any point of time. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: To reach your Destination, you need a Direction, but you can't get there without Inspiration!- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Today is a tomorrow that we thought about yesterday. Don't worry about tomorrow. Take care of today because if you take care of today tomorrow will take care of itself.

Author: RVM
Quote: Today, I will look around & enjoy all the beautiful things that are around me rather than yearn for things that are beyond my control & become miserable.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Today's happiness depends on yesterday's choice, just as today's choice will determine tomorrow's happiness.

Author: RVM
Quote: Tranquility is a Choice. So is Anxiety. The entire world around us may be in Turmoil. But if we want to be Peaceful within, WE CAN.

Author: RVM
Quote: Tranquility is a Choice. So is Anxiety. The entire world around us may be in Turmoil. But if we want to be Peaceful within, WE CAN.- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Treasure your Ideas, for they are like seeds that germinate in your mind. They Root, Shoot, and Fruit into Concepts & Creativity that are beyond Imagination.

Author: RVM
Quote: Very often, we let little things spoil some of our most important treasures our Moment, our Day, our Life.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Wake up in the morning and get into each day, living it in a way that will make you happy and gay.

Author: RVM
Quote: Waves in an ocean remind us that just as they come and go, we too will. What matters is did we make a good splash before leaving?

Author: RVM
Quote: We all know that Hurry is the main cause of Worry. Yet we Hurry and Worry and miss the most beautiful experience called Life.

Author: RVM
Quote: We are FREE, not bound like a Tree. We can Move, we can Dance... We can take a Chance!-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: We don't know Where God is, Who God is or What God is BUT GOD IS!

Author: RVM
Quote: We don't know Where God is, Who God is or What God is BUT GOD IS! -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: We salute the Brain, that made the Plane and the Train But who made the Brain?

Author: RVM
Quote: We will be remembered not by how much money we have left in the bank or by how many buildings and cars we owned, but by how many Lives we have touched and Transformed!

Author: RVM
Quote: What a paradox! People hate to be miserable but choose to be miserable. Remember this the next time misery arrives.

Author: RVM
Quote: What is a Miracle? It is something that was once thought Impossible but became Possible with FAITH.

Author: RVM
Quote: What is the Power that transcends one from Achievement to Fulfillment? The Power of Inspiration!- RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: What matters is not how many miles you run What matters is whether you are having Fun! -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: When Passion meets Inspiration, an Obsession is born.

Author: RVM
Quote: When the inner Spirit has Liberation, Inspiration is born!

Author: RVM
Quote: When we let our GREED become our NEED, we can never be HAPPY indeed!-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Whenever negativity makes us drip, Inspiration creates a flip from Negative to Positive.

Author: RVM
Quote: While a rich man cannot have more than 1440 minutes a day, a clever man makes more time by using OPM or Other People's Minutes.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Why destroy this Morn, by a Past that is dead & Gone and a Future not yet Born!-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Why just celebrate birthdays? Why not celebrate every day? In reality, we are born anew everyday. Everyday is a Birthday!

Author: RVM
Quote: With Inspiration, Liberation and Determination, you can reach any Destination.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: With Time, you can create Money, but with Money you cannot create Time. So Time is more valuable than Money.

Author: RVM
Quote: Within us is Energy which when channelized, spirals into Inspiration. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Worries come and worries go They challenge us and make us Grow! -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: Would you prefer to drag through life for 100 years or live with excitement for 50?

Author: RVM
Quote: Would you prefer to drag through life for 100 years or live with excitement for 50? -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: You can Live in your Cave OR Dance to your Grave.

Author: RVM
Quote: You may have Limitations, but don't let the Limitations Limit you!

Author: RVM
Quote: You must be present in the present to make it a present.

Author: RVM
Quote: You must be present in the present to make it a present. -RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: You must be willing to play with Failure before you reach Success.-RVM

Author: RVM
Quote: You spend your TIME to make a DIME. You lose your HEALTH to make your WEALTH, but at the end it is FUNNY because you leave back all your MONEY.-RVM

Author: Ryan Lilly
Quote: Get off the treadmill of consumption, replication, and mediocrity. Begin lifting the weights of creativity, originality, and success.

Author: S.R. Crawford
Quote: A fortress doesn't fall unless its towers are weakened.

Author: saadshah
Quote: Learning starts with single word "WHY".

Author: Sabrina Newby
Quote: Your skill, strength, and overall survival are offensive to some people. Those are definitely not your people.

Author: Sachin Kumar Puli
Quote: Unwilling to give-up & willing to fail. That's how you succeed.

Author: Safaya Carbon
Quote: When life hands you lemons, get yourself some limes because life can't be trusted.

Author: Sage Steadman
Quote: They looked to each other for support, for strength, and at times, motivation, to remember why and for whom they lived.

Author: Saim .A. Cheeda
Quote: Let the spark in you catch fire and burn into the air, so that it may light up the sky.

Author: Saim Cheeda
Quote: It is not the presence of despair that ails you, but the absence of hope.

Author: Samael Aun Weor
Quote: We need something that encourages us to work, we need an intimate aid. This is only possible through meditation.

Author: Samer Chidiac
Quote: Sometimes you can't walk your dream journey. Find a way!

Author: Samer Chidiac
Quote: When you dive into your past, remember to go back up quickly.

Author: Samer Chidiac
Quote: You might be on the right track, but you can't just stand there!

Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote: Vladimir, be reasonable, you haven't yet tried everything. And I resumed the struggle.

Author: Samuel Butler
Quote: All progress is based upon a universal innate desire on the part of every organism to live beyond its income.

Author: Samuel Coleridge
Quote: And he can make, so say the wise, no claim who makes no sacrifice.

Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.

Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote: Life affords no higher pleasure than that of surmounting difficulties.

Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote: Nothing will ever be attempted if all possible objections must first be overcome.

Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote: What we hope to do with ease, we must learn first to do with diligence.

Author: Sandeep
Quote: To win the game, just remain in the game. Failure is a path to success so don't give up; just move on with firm determination.

Author: Sandra Byrd
Quote: If your arteries are good, eat more ice cream. If they are bad, drink more red wine. Proceed thusly.

Author: Sandra Swinney
Quote: It is amazing how much people can get done if they do not worry about who gets the credit.

Author: Sanjai Velayudhan
Quote: If you don't make history, you just become history!

Author: Sanober  Khan
Quote: Turn your fears into excitement. Your anxieties into enthusiasm. Your passion into energy.

Author: santhosh sandy
Quote: My failure is only for today, not for the tomorrow.

Author: Sara Secora
Quote: Above all, protect your inner light. There are those that seek to take it from you.

Author: Sarah Morgan
Quote: The dream was on hold. It wasn't dead.

Author: Saru Singhal
Quote: People would say - to break free, to soar, and sadly, to chop your wings too. The moment you listen to them, you voluntarily put yourself in a cage. Be a free soul - fly or fall on your own terms.

Author: Sarvesh Jain
Quote: You can cage their wings, you can't cage their spirit.

Author: Saudi Arabian Proverb
Quote: The strength of the heart comes from the soundness of the faith.

Author: Scott Alexander
Quote: The basic rule of free enterprise: You must give in order to get.

Author: Scott Reed
Quote: One step - choosing a goal and sticking to it - changes everything.

Author: Scottish Proverb
Quote: Perfect love cannot be without equality.

Author: Sebastian Horsley
Quote: The motivation of all artists is 'Look at me, Mum'.

Author: Seneca
Quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as well as labor does the body.

Author: Seneca
Quote: It is impossible to imagine anything which better becomes a ruler than mercy.

Author: Seneca
Quote: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.

Author: Seneca
Quote: He who has great power should use it lightly.

Author: Seneca
Quote: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.

Author: Seneca
Quote: Our plans miscarry because they have no aim. When a man does not know what harbor he is making for, no wind is the right wind.

Author: Seneca
Quote: Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for kindness.

Author: Shah Asad Rizvi
Quote: Dance less in motion and more in spirit; awaken the dreamer within.

Author: Shah Asad Rizvi
Quote: Dance resides within us all. Some find it when joy conquers sorrow, others express it through celebration of movements; and then there are those... whose existence is dance,

Author: Shah Asad Rizvi
Quote: Hearts shall dance once again; when canvas of ice is painted with the brush of skates.

Author: Shah Asad Rizvi
Quote: Music does not need language of words for it has movements of dance to do its translation.

Author: Shah Asad Rizvi
Quote: Soar like an eagle beyond skies of heavens reach; as wings of dreams dance with winds of reality.

Author: Shah Asad Rizvi
Quote: When the melody plays, footsteps move, heart sings and spirit begin to dance.

Author: Shah Asad Rizvi
Quote: World seems like a void of silence every time footsteps are deprived of dancing shoes.

Author: Shakespeare
Quote: Action is eloquence.

Author: Shampa Sharma
Quote: Everything good starts with caring.

Author: Sheila Burke
Quote: When you change the way you feel, it changes the way you think. When you change the way you think, you change the way you deal with everything in life.

Author: Sheila Burke
Quote: You know that you won't remain Centered all the time, and it is a normal part of human life to drift left or right of Center sometimes.

Author: Sheila M. Burke
Quote: Dwelling on the past is like dragging a boat over dry land.

Author: Sheila M. Burke
Quote: Everything is in the root. If you pick the weed without getting the root out of the soil, be assured, it is going to grow back.

Author: Sheila M. Burke
Quote: It's about letting yourself feel, but not wallow; it's about leaning into love, not fear, as the preferred force in your life.

Author: Sheila M. Burke
Quote: Sometimes the way to personal freedom seems scary - Take the first step to begin the release of doubt and fear. Each new step builds confidence. Breathe. Don't look back.

Author: Sheila M. Burke
Quote: Sometimes you're going to shine like the sun; sometimes you're going to crumble to pieces. Either way, it's okay.

Author: Sheila M. Burke
Quote: The expensive car you bought doesn't matter, but the way you treated the salesman did.

Author: Sheila M. Burke
Quote: When the ego is in the driver's seat, we judge. When our spirit, our authentic self, is in control, we practice listening (without judging), compassion, and love

Author: Sheila M. Burke
Quote: When you change the way you feel, it changes the way you think. When you change the way you think, you change the way you deal with everything in life.

Author: Sheila M. Burke
Quote: You know that you won't remain Centered all the time, and it is a normal part of human life to drift left or right of Center sometimes.

Author: Sheilanda Khoirunnisa

Author: Sherry Anderson

Author: Shraga Silverstein

Author: Shraga Silverstein

Author: Shraga Silverstein

Author: Shraga Silverstein

Author: Shraga Silverstein

Author: Shraga Silverstein

Author: Shraga Silverstein

Author: Shraga Silverstein

Author: Shraga Silverstein

Author: Shulonie

Author: Sidney Powell

Author: Sidonie Gabrielle

Author: Socrates

Author: Solon

Author: Spanish Proverb

Author: Stephan Labossiere

Author: Stephanie Faith

Author: Stephen Covey
Quote: In every problem there is a hidden treasure inside. It's your job to find it.

Author: Stephen Covey

Author: Stephen Covey
Quote: Live out of your imagination, not your history.

Author: Stephen Covey

Author: Stephen Covey

Author: Stephen Covey
Quote: Basing our happiness on our ability to control everything is futile.

Author: Stephen Covey
Quote: Be patient with yourself. Self-growth is tender; it's holy ground. There's no greater investment.

Author: Stephen Covey
Quote: Between stimulus and response is our greatest power -- the freedom to choose.

Author: Stephen Covey

Author: Stephen Covey
Quote: Don't argue for other people's weaknesses. Don't argue for your own. When you make a mistake, admit it, correct it, and learn from it--immediately.

Author: Stephen Covey
Quote: Effective people are not problem-minded; they're opportunity-minded. They feed opportunities and starve problems.

Author: Stephen Covey

Author: Stephen Hawking

Author: Stephen R. Covey
Quote: Private victories precede public victories.

Author: Stephen Richards

Author: Steve Maraboli

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: I will not play it safe! I want to experience the length, depth, and breadth of life. I'm not just here for the victories... I'm here for the scars.

Author: Steve Maraboli

Author: Steve Maraboli

Author: Steve Maraboli

Author: Steve Walton

Author: Steven Covey

Author: Steven Spielberg

Author: Storm Jameson

Author: Su Shi

Author: Subham Dwivedi

Author: Sugar Ray Robinson
Quote: To be a champion, you have  to believe  in yourself when  nobody else will.

Author: Sugar Ray Robinson
Quote: To be a champion, you have to believe in yourself when nobody else will.

Author: Sujit Lalwani

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: Follow Your Heart & The world Shall Follow YOU! Reject it and It stops beating!

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: Goal Of LIFE Is patience, Goal Of Patience Is LIFE!

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: Have a GOAL to keep the following 5-'H' OUT of your life Harass, Hamper, Hurt, Harm and Hinder to Ensure H = Happiness Prevails forever!

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: IT's All In The Game Of Mind.

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: Leadership is all about caring, daring and sharing! Caring for people, Daring to Act fearlessly, & Sharing the success with all!

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: Once You keep Aside the Emotional side Of yours, Is when You stop using the phrase This was a BAD PHASE of life..

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: Reputation Is Temporary....As Much as The Man Owning Your Reputation Is

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: The 4 pillars Of the Greatest Religion ever Are Love Trust Character & Brotherhood...

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: The challenge of life is regretless decision making, relentless pursuit of vision with faith, forgiving others, enduring pain with a smile & achieving goals with an extra MILE

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: The Glory Is Always Hidden Between The Lines Of the Story

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: The wisdom of LIFE eludes even the best... For those who pass the test Life is a fest, While, its forever, A battle for the rest..

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: What You were Once, Was Also Because You Were Someone Else Before that

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: When every minute of your day is planned & you are packed for days, you shall soon realize that the pain of past fades, vision of life gets clearer and all that seemed to poison your life Ceases to exist.

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: WINNER: is A Runner who Wins In spite Of Ninety Nine Excellent Runners!

Author: Sujit Lalwani
Quote: Without the desire to be patient patience doesn't happen, Just like without the desire to grow, LIFE doesn't happen!

Author: Sukant Ratnakar
Quote: We do not need to attend classroom training programmes for everything. Observation opens the windows of knowledge around us

Author: Sun Tzu
Quote: Opportunities multiply as they are seized.

Author: Sunday Adelaja
Quote: To discover the original plan of God is to manifest the work of creation

Author: Susan Podziba

Author: Suzy Kassem
Quote: A life fueled by passions is like riding on the back of a dragon.

Author: Suzy Kassem
Quote: Destiny reveals itself only when there is truth and action.

Author: Suzy Kassem
Quote: Every flower blooms at its own pace.

Author: Suzy Kassem
Quote: Faith keeps our ships moving, while empathy and the memories of our experiences lead to wisdom.

Author: Suzy Kassem
Quote: If life throws you a few bad notes or vibrations, don't let them interrupt or alter your song.

Author: Suzy Kassem
Quote: If only you could see the greatness in yourself, you wouldn't envy the greatness in others.

Author: Suzy Kassem
Quote: If you can show people how to build castles, make sure you do not neglect building and nurturing your own.

Author: Suzy Kassem

Author: Suzy Kassem
Quote: Momentum builds success.

Author: Suzy Kassem

Author: Suzy Kassem

Author: Suzy Kassem

Author: Suzy Kassem

Author: Suzy Kassem
Quote: You cannot move things by not moving.

Author: Suzy Kassem
Quote: You can't move things by not moving.

Author: Swami Sivananda

Author: Swami Vivekananda

Author: Sydney Bremer

Author: Syed Ahmad Fathi
